Text:
Adequate ordering via the Internet is already a big advantage, because in some establishments you still have to write to Viber and throw money inexplicably.

That's where the good stuff ends.
The rolls come with ordinary square tubs with no wasabi and dubious ginger.
They took the most expensive set, where they probably should have put the best rolls, only one turned out to be tasty - maki with shrimp. The roll covered with processed cheese is simply disgusting, the rest of the order is not good, it is also cut crookedly üíî

Just now I found out that sushi appeared in my apartment. I immediately decided to try it and regretted that I didn't know about them before. Everything is very tasty. The products are fresh, the portions are large. We didn't specify how many people to prepare the dishes for, we were given separate dishes, ginger and wasabi for each portion of rolls, which was especially pleasing. Definitely recommend
I ordered sushi - the rolls are fresh and tasty. Good quality packaging. I liked.

Sushi is big and very tasty, fast and cheap, not crowded. It was difficult to find a place, I went around the yards and then saw a pink sign on a pole, I attached a photo of the entrance, maybe it will help someone.
Very tasty sushi, I would especially recommend baked ones

The food was good. My issue was with the waitress. She was impatient and after I received my meal I didn‚Äôt see her again until I asked me for the bill. I had to get up to get a napkin. Then waited and waited for a top up of my drink but didn‚Äôt see her or any else for that matter. Then when I had pushed away my empty plates, she showed up asking if that will be cash or credit card. Then before I had a chance to open my wallet she was back ready to collect the cash. It‚Äôs too bad for the owner, I would have had a few more drinks and possibly desert but now I will not go back at all.

Text: Not great, not terrible. We were a larger group, and I think we were the only ones at the restaurant on a Wednesday evening. The waitress was a lovely young lady, but she forgot to bring cutlery and mixed up one of the dishes in the order ‚Äì it happens. Banosh was nice, holubtsi ‚Äì so-so. Had to wait a long time for the food, and they didn't have enough regular size glasses for beers for us (we were about 15 people max). So we ordered several of the gigantic ones :) Hard to imagine how they cope when there are more people at the restaurant.

Text: True to say, don‚Äôt know why everyone complain about service. We‚Äôve been here dozens of times and never had this issue. Of course this is not a hipster fancy restaurant, but food is good, portions big, prices very pleasant. Average bill for two is around 400-500UAH (with drinks!) So if you want something fancy stylish - continue searching, but if you want tasty Ukrainian food for everyday, then this is your place for sure.

Text:
The institution is not bad. But for us the disadvantages were‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ ordered borscht with some kind of baked bread - delicious, but the potatoes in the borscht were clearly undercooked
‚Ä¢ were in January - it was cold in the hall, you could put pillows on the wooden chairs
‚Ä¢ cooking time - from 20 to 30 minutes (

But from the pluses‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ banosh with sour cream and crackers is super, I recommend it
‚Ä¢ dumplings with torn meat are super tasty
Check for 1 and 2 dishes and 2 compotes for two 700 UAH

I am not sure that I will come here again because of the disadvantages that I described above

Unfortunately, they spent money on advertising and PR in the media and saved on the main thing - the quality of dishes and service.
Ordered olivier and bograch.
The presentation is good, but the taste :(
Olivier had undercooked potatoes. Bograch is thickened with flour or something else for an unknown purpose. Perhaps this is some Galician recipe that has not been found anywhere ‚ôÇÔ∏è ü§∑.
The dishes were served for a very long time, the service by the waiter could also be better.

Had the worst ribs ever that were highly recommended by staff. Over dry and nearly impossible to separate. When the waiter asked how food was and I told her about the ribs, she said ‚Äúoh well, hope you like them better next time‚Äù.

Additionally, the restaurant that has ‚Äúbeer‚Äù in its title had only one kind of draft beer and no beer platters. Some other menu items were also missing.

The waitress removed my fork with the appetizer and when the main course was served, I had to wait for at least 5 minutes to get another one (after I had to get up and ask for it)

Additionally, they charged me extra on an pos-terminal entry error and it took another 10 minutes for them to try to figure out how to refund my card before they finally decided to just give me back some cash.

Text: This is not the first time we visit this establishment, everything is always very tasty, beautiful, atmospheric! Cool presentation of dishes in beautiful dishes, nuggets and fries for children are served in a cool wooden plate in the shape of a hare. We visit the institution with children, on the second floor there is a spacious children's room with a pool with balls and a lot of other toys. The service and staff are friendly and always happy to help and advise. Among the minuses, it can be noted that it is difficult to find a free table during peak hours, and due to the large number of visitors, sometimes the children's room is a little overcrowded, but these are minor things)) I am glad that a decent establishment has finally appeared in this area!

A very cool institution. One of the best in the area. The service is good, the cuisine is very tasty. The facility itself is very comfortable and cozy, with a beautiful interior. I have been here more than once, I recommend it.
Tasty, clean, pleasant staff! Special praise for the children's room, which is always cleaned!
Great place, I recommend it!

Text:
It's not the first time we come, and the pastries are half as much as before, and the prices are still rising. It is very interesting why the owners think that it is normal to sell pastries that are half the price of the standard price. Text: A wonderful institution. I like that you can both order pizza and eat something more traditional. The dishes are simply great, very tasty and at a good price!
Today is my birthday. And I chose to celebrate with your products. Since childhood, we have been waiting for a good filling. And here!!!!!! Very good dough and delicious fillings!!!!

A very nice atmospheric place with an elaborate interior üòç
I wish there was more variety on the menu for such a beautiful place.
They took a pizza that was already cooked, but it was already cold and therefore not tasty, I would have liked to have been offered to warm up a piece of pizza when it had already cooled down, so 4 stars

Service on the second floor is simply zero! The girls at the counter on the first floor are super nice and friendly, but if the place on the second floor has a waiter, then do it the human way. The waiter came up with an unfriendly face and didn't even say hello, her first and last words were: "Tell you what?". We ordered a pizza for two people, we didn't like that the utensils were brought out for it, but the portion plates were not. Also wanted drinks on the second to be served in glassware if possible. It's not the first time I've been here, the food and atmosphere are always great, but the waiters always discourage me from coming again...
The place has an extensive vegetarian menu with plenty of delicious options. I highly recommend trying their sandwiches, wraps and smashed potato with cutlet.

Text:
This was our first time at Kabuki, and we were surprised that it is located in the corner of a food court.

As our meal began, the food court melted away, and we had an amazing evening.  The kind, friendly,  knowledgeable, and talented crew produced one of the finest teppanyaki meals we've had.

Definitely check it out.

This was our first time at Kabuki, and we were surprised that it is located in the corner of a food court.

As our meal began, the food court melted away, and we had an amazing evening.  The kind, friendly,  knowledgeable, and talented crew produced one of the finest teppanyaki meals we've had.

Definitely check it out.

Text:
We tried the duck and soup as starters, and the rib-eye steak and prawn & scallops as mains. All were super tasty and different to anything we've tried before. Delicate and layered flavours yet somehow still punchy and interesting tastes. The chef is really skilled and friendly, he interacted with us and shared interesting facts. Sad the meal is over! Definitely recommended.

Hint: The meal advert cards at the front of their bar just aren't good enough to showcase the food or experience.

Text:
One of the best sushi‚Äôs in the world, what more can I say?! We keep ordering and the quality is always high.

The only wish I have is to be able to order earlier - 1pm is too late for us to eat, lunch hour (12pm) would be perfect. Unfortunately this is true for most restaurants in Poland. But their competition - Origami Sushi (also good but not as good as here) opens at 11am already so sometimes we choose them just because we can‚Äôt wait till 1pm to eat. Maybe they can open earlier too soon! It would definitively be more convenient to people from outside Poland who are used to eating at 12pm.

Text: I recently visited a Japanese restaurant and had a wonderful experience. I opted for the Sukiyaki and it was incredibly delicious, filling me up completely. The Teppanyaki-style cooking was unique for me as a European, and it seemed to be a popular choice amongst the locals. The restaurant had a great ambiance with a lively atmosphere, and the service was top-notch. The staff was friendly and accommodating, making sure that I had an enjoyable time. Overall, I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for an authentic Japanese dining experience. The food, ambiance, and service were all outstanding, making for a memorable meal.

Text:
Excellent restaurant all round, I've dined here at least a dozen times and the food has always been excellent.

While I don't know if the food is authentic or not, this place just feels like a local Japanese restaurant that I imagine in my head, because the atmosphere is great and the takoyaki is fantastic.

Food is not that expensive either, a single meal is around the 15-20‚Ç¨ range, but that is just with rice. One with salad, Misoshiru soup, a starter and the meal, called teishoku starts around 30‚Ç¨ which is not bad at all. The pictured meal was 51,50‚Ç¨ which includes a glass of genshu umeshu, takoyaki, oshinko and tempura no moriawase as the bigger meal package, teishoku. Great prices for Helsinki.

Text:
Overpriced for what it really is!

I ordered tempura set. It came out nicely presented, but some pieces were so oily, and had no flavor. The portion only came with three shrimps, one piece of squid, one piece of eggplant, one super oily kakiage (mixed veggies tempura) and one slice of onion (not my favorite), and I was charged for 20‚Ç¨. Overall it was really underwhelming.

My friends ordered the ‚Äútoday special‚Äù Gyudon, and trust me, that dish in the picture is not how Gyudon looks and tastes. The beef were really chewy, had bones in it, and the sauce were too salty. Not authentic at all.

The most infuriating thing was my friend‚Äôs yakitori (no picture unfortunately). Her yakitori dish was two TINY sticks of chicken, sad and dry!

In the end we left the restaurant with half-full stomachs. Not recommended!

Text:
Nice experience but average food. I liked the environment and the fact that the restaurant is huge and you can have your meal in different formulas: √° la carte menu, buffet, sushi train or teppanyaki (Japanese grill). While the sushi is average quality, we liked the grill because you have a chef cooking your dinner on the grill surface on your table. They also give you a nice Japanese robe to protect you from any food stains, perfect for some funny Instagram stories. While there, there were many birthday celebrations. Every 30 minutes the happy birthday song was on. For the discovery menu including two pieces of sushi, salad, miso soup, grill (beef. squid, salmon and vegetables) and a dessert (one scoop of ice cream with some fruit on top), you pay 30 euros without the drink.
I would go eat again there only to show the cooking performance and the sushi train to my friends. I would skip the restaurant if that‚Äôs only for the sushi.

Text:
I was very excited about this place since i read the excellent rating.
Sadly i was disappointed. Compared to other sushi places in the area like Vi-Dai in Colomiers, the Kabuki Sushi is a little more expensive. The restaurant itself looks great but i would only give 6 out of 10 stars for the suhsi (maki rolls and california rolls). It was too much rice and too little fillings.
The Miso Soup was probably the worst i ever had. 3,50‚Ç¨ for a little soup that tastes very much like water. I was so unfortunate to have a long black hair in my soup too...
The best about my visit was probably the salad. It was very tasty but too expensive as well.
I will not go there again in the close future.

Text:
Really nothing to say: one of the best sushi experience I ever had!

Kabuki is one of the three restaurants in Madrid that created the rise of sushi masters in the capital of Madrid. I remember when the only two sushi places in Madrid were a decrepit place in Chueca and Kabuki. Nowadays, the capital of Madrid has dozens of decent sushi restaurants but Chef Sanz's Kabuki is clearly a pioneer. He changed it all when it comes to sushi and that is a monumental contribution to the culinary environment of Madrid. As a restaurant, Kabuki continues to lead the scene of Japanese restaurants in Madrid. If you are in Madrid and feel like sushi, go to Kabuki. That simple.

As a restaurant, Kabuki continues to lead the scene of Japanese restaurants in Madrid. If you are in Madrid and feel like sushi, go to Kabuki. That simple.

Place Name: Kabuki Canton Grenoble (Asian Sushi Bar restaurant japonais)
Text:
A pretty establishment with a great selection of sushi, cocktails and food. For those that are into Instagram or overall social media, this place would be perfect, as every shot comes out pretty and aesthetic!
Service is a little slow, but if you have a cocktail at hand, I don't think you'll notice. The fish is fresh, generous portions and high in quality! We felt like the maki had too much rice, but everything else was very delightful.
The sashimi salad was our favorite from everything that we tried and the dry ice is a simple yet effective trick! We will return for more!

The sashimi salad was our favorite from everything that we tried and the dry ice is a simple yet effective trick! We will return for more!

Text:
Honestly the room staff is incredible. They treated us great and were very attentive to our constructive criticism.
2 stars for the kitchen. Honestly it was a disappointment. The separation of the kabukis is noticeable where the kitchen part left off.
I don't understand the spicy point and I love fusion cuisine, but in this case I think you either do Mexican or you do Japanese. The coexistence of both in the kitchen is not trivial.
It may be that we were also unlucky and found ourselves already biased by this fact. The raw clams (later they offered us to change it, I tell you, no problem with the room). The suckling pig roll looked like one of those ordinary sushi bars. He didn't tell us anything. Then some bull, squid and shrimp niguiris that didn't tell us much, very simple. Some scallops with a background that stung the De Dios. Anyway, a bit of a disaster.
Original Text:
Sinceramente el personal de la sala es incre√≠ble. Nos trataron genial y muy atentos a nuestras cr√≠ticas constructivas.
2 estrellas a la cocina. Sinceramente fue una decepci√≥n. La separaci√≥n de los kabukis se nota donde qued√≥ la parte de la cocina.
El punto picante no lo llego a entender y me encanta la cocina fusi√≥n, pero en este caso creo q o haces mexicano o haces japo. La convivencia de ambos en la cocina no es trivial.
Puede ser que tambi√©n tuvimos mala suerte y nos encontramos ya sesgados por este hecho. Las almejas crudas (luego nos ofrecieron cambiarlo, ya os digo, ning√∫n problema con la sala). El rollito de cochinita, parec√≠a de esos sushi-bar cualquiera. No nos dijo nada. Luego unos niguiris de toro, calamar y gamba que no nos dijeron mucho, muy simples. Unas vieras con un fondo que picaba la De Dios. En fin, un poco desastre.

Text: Yesterday we had dinner at the new Kabuki. The place is spectacular and the service is friendly and attentive to customers. The quality of the fish is first class, but I would say that it does not reach the level and flavors of his previous partner Ricardo Sanz. Of what we ordered, I would highlight the tako sunomono aguachile and the clams with a delicious Asian sauce. The times between dishes are somewhat slow. I don't give more than 3 stars to the food because the price is high and the expectations we had were higher.
Original Text: Ayer cenamos en el nuevo Kabuki. El local es espectacular y el servicio amable y pendiente de los clientes. La calidad del pescado es de primera, pero dir√≠a que no alcanza el nivel y sabores de su anterior socio Ricardo Sanz. De lo que pedimos destacar√≠a el tako sunomono aguachile y las almejas con una salsa asi√°tica buen√≠sima. Los tiempos entre plato y plato algo lentos. No pongo m√°s de 3 estrellas en la comida porque el precio es elevado y la espectativa que ten√≠amos era m√°s alta.

Text: An incredible experience. The place is decorated with care, with a pleasant atmosphere and top-notch service, but if there is something to highlight it is the dishes. Delicious, very successful and with a very good quality of the products. If I have to choose two, I recommend the niguiris with egg and the tuna tartare, but it's a difficult choice! I'm saving it to surprise visitors who come to Madrid, highly recommended. Thanks to the Kabuki team.
Original Text: Una experiencia incre√≠ble. El local est√° decorado con mimo, con un ambiente agradable y un servicio de diez, pero si hay algo que destacar son los platos. Deliciosos, muy logrados y con una buen√≠sima calidad de los productos. Si tengo que quedarme con dos, recomiendo los niguiris con huevo y el tartar de at√∫n, ¬°pero es una dif√≠cil elecci√≥n! Me lo guardo para sorprender a las visitas que vengan a Madrid, muy recomendable. Gracias al equipo de Kabuki.

Text:
Those who know all the Kabuki that have opened in the Spanish geography will recognize in this Kabuki the essence of the brand both culinary wise, there are many of the dishes created by its chefs throughout history - you can see the work of Alejandro Dur√°n, but the hand of some of the hidden stars of the brand in recent years such as David Rivero, Victor Serrano or Rafa Carrasco appears; As aesthetically, I always thought that the interior designer has been influenced by the shadow of Tanizaki, although I have to admit that in this place he has surpassed himself, because he has managed to balance it with personalized lighting and sound that take it to another level: that detail is nothing It's trivial to have your own light on each table and music accompanying you, but not spoiling the food, it's the best.

On this first visit I choose the Ankawa Nigiri and the Kabuki Brioche dessert. The first is brutal, this new version is a turbot delicacy that I already knew the Japanese love, but, eating it here, you realize why. And the second, because traditionally desserts have not been the brand's main dish, but with this Brioche with artisan yuzu ice cream, more than one will go just to eat it.

In addition to the restaurant, it has a bar that can mark a before and after in such a commercial area. Being able to go and have a snack -without entering the restaurant-, almost at any time from 1:30 p.m., is wonderful. A short food menu, but ideal to accompany a drink and continue on the path or have an after-dinner meal, now that so many restaurants do not allow it. The whiskey menu in this bar is impressive, you don't usually see things like this in the Forum, a divine selection of Japanese whiskeys and a Macallan vertical that only lovers of these spirits will be able to appreciate in their proper measure. For my part, I'll stick with DF C√≥ctel, a signature version of Tom Collins, because those of us who knew the now defunct Sudestada, know that it is a full-fledged tribute to the brand and the level it set.
Original Text:
Aquellos que conocen todos los Kabuki que han abierto en la geograf√≠a espa√±ola, reconocer√°n en este Kabuki la esencia de la marca tanto culinariamente, hay muchos de los platos creados por sus cocineros a lo largo de historia -se ve el trabajo de Alejandro Dur√°n, pero aparece la mano de algunos de los cracks ocultos de la marca de los √∫ltimos a√±os como David Rivero, Victor Serrano o Rafa Carrasco-; como est√©ticamente, siempre pens√© que dise√±ador de interiores ha estado influido por la sombra de Tanizaki, aunque tengo reconocer que en este local se ha superado, porque ha conseguido equilibrarlo con una iluminaci√≥n y un sonido personalizados que lo llevan a otro nivel: ese detalle nada balad√≠ de tener luz propia en cada mesa y la m√∫sica acompa√±√°ndote, pero no fastidiando la comida, es lo m√°s.

Me quedo en esta primera visita con el Nigiri de Ankawa y el postre de Kabuki Brioche. El primero es brutal, esta nueva versi√≥n es una delicatessen de rodaballo que ya sab√≠a que los japoneses adoran, pero, al comerlo aqu√≠, uno se da cuenta de por qu√©. Y el segundo, porque tradicionalmente los postres no han sido el plato fuerte de la marca, pero con este Brioche con helado artesano de yuzu, m√°s de uno ir√° s√≥lo a comerlo.

Adem√°s del restaurante, tiene un bar que puede marcar un antes y un despu√©s en una zona tan comercial. Eso de poder ir, tomar un picoteo -sin entrar en el restaurante-, casi a cualquier hora desde la 13.30, es maravilloso. Una carta de comida corta, pero ideal acompa√±ar una copa y seguir el camino o hacer la sobremesa, ahora que tantos restaurantes no lo permiten. Impresiona de este bar la carta de whiskys, no se suelen ver cosas as√≠ en el Foro, una selecci√≥n divina de whiskys japoneses y una vertical de Macallan que solo los amantes de estos destilados podr√°n apreciar en su justa de medida. Yo por mi parte me quedo con DF C√≥ctel, una versi√≥n de autor del Tom Collins, porque aquellos que conocimos los del ya desaparecido Sudestada, sabemos que es un homenaje en toda regla a la marca y al nivel que marc√≥.

Text:
Lovely restaurant with lovely interior design and atmosphere. There was a live music as well which was a nice compliment.
To dine in this place we were waiting outside for half hour to get sited. Initially we were taking to the room downstairs and were surprised as several tables were unoccupied. The question is: why they didn't invite us to sit sooner but left us waiting outside on the cold?
The basement hall had no internet connection and less nice than the main one, so we asked to be moved as some people left. That was ok. We were permitted to stay on the main room.
We ordered for 4 people. First arrived one dish for one of us, 30 minutes later arrived another one and 30 minutes after that arrived other two. They were simple dishes. Why should we have waited for an hour??? We probably were forgotten.
The 'pork meat Gutsul stile' was nice as well as 'oven baked vegetables with cheese' but the 'oven baked chicken potatoes under chees' was rubbish.
Overal experience: tried it once. It was okeish but wouldn't come back.
Service and food were very average as well as the price.

Text: Taste of noodles is ok but...there are lots of thing because of which I just can't recommend this place.  The service is really really slow. It looks like the waiters are not interested in their work. The restaurant was only 1/3 full of people but we waited for the menu for 10 min. Than waited for the noodles for another 25 min...but still one of us (me) stayed hungry because they forgot about the soup that I ordered. When I asked for my soup the waiter told me to wait for another 2 min, than brought me another soup (not the one that I ordered!!!) But after I put the spoon (still I really wanted to eat) in it they shouted STOP! and told me that this is another person's soup and it was mistake. So they took it to another client. Anyway I didn't get my order at all, because they just forgot about it. Paid for noodles for my bf and I just went away hungry...

Text:
I have been a client of Beauty Code for 4 years and visited almost all the doctors of the clinic. I can note the professionalism, customer orientation and friendliness of all doctors. Here I successfully cured acne, completed a course of LE, select and adjust daily care with doctors and work on the quality of the skin with the help of various procedures. I especially like the constant development of the clinic and the expansion of the assortment of procedures and care cosmetics.
I don't know how Khrystyna Serhiyivna manages it, but the female doctors and administrators really complement each other and this makes the clinic something bigger. I want to come here again‚ù§Ô∏è

I would like to thank Margarita Sokyrko for her support and help during the fight against stage 4 acne, to be honest, I have practically come to terms with the fact that I will have acne for the rest of my life. For about a year, I was afraid to look at my face in the mirror....
But no, 5 months have passed!!!
the results are excellent and this is not the end of the course of treatment...
The most important thing is not to engage in self-medication, but to turn to specialists....
Good health and clean, smooth skin to everyone.
Margarita, thank you ü§ù‚ò∫Ô∏è

I want to thank the Beauty Code clinic team for their professionalism, excellent knowledge of their business, hospitality and friendliness! Text: Today my friend and I were in a wonderful place where we managed to combine style, concept, taste and friendliness) incredible coffee, delicious bowls. The prices are not low, but believe me, this place is a must visit. I really, really liked it)

Text: We came to this establishment around 6 pm, ordering 4 borscht, khachapuri, banosh, and mashed potatoes. We received the order at 7:30, we began to suspect that the vegetables for the borscht were grown during the cooking process, the borscht was not bad, we were lucky, the banosh turned out to be semolina porridge, with lumps (!!!), the puree was made from one potato, apparently she was also grown, because we received this miracle, at about 7:40. Now the highlight of the program, KHACHAPURI, photo attached, in Adjara, turned out to be a cheese bun with fried eggs. The place is disgusting, the table next door has not been cleaned for 2 hours at the time of writing this review, the service is disgusting, you have to clean the dirty dishes yourself at the next table, the prices are high, prohibitively high, it would be better to eat shawarma. The place is terrible, I don't recommend it to anyone

Gorgeous! Inexpensive! Amazing! Unobtrusively!) They came and took two borscht, meat and lean, and sweet dumplings, everything was super! Meat borscht is served with pampushka, lard and 25g of vodka! Probably for the first time I was delighted with borscht, which was not prepared by my mother!) Well, and as a bonus there is an excellent photo place at the entrance)

Terrible place. Diet borscht, like in a canteen. The dishes were brought not washed, the dumplings waited for more than an hour. There are no napkins on the tables, you had to ask, they took 40 minutes to bring the napkins, and they constantly reminded you. The tablecloths on the tables are not changed or washed. We sat with a mountain of dishes for about 20 minutes, you‚Äôll have to clear it yourself if you want to order a lot. Even the chairs are dirty.

This place is fantastic!
It‚Äôs spacious and stylish. This is a place for vegetarians, they have all kinds of vegetable milk. Food is delicious. There are a lot of snacks and main dishes. Prices are reasonable for the food you get. Food and coffee here will cost you ~5-6$ depending on what you eat.
Staff is friendly and helpful.
You won‚Äôt regret going here.

Text: The best food in Lviv you can ever find! Everything is so delicious, all on the menu is very tasty and well-made. The interior is also very beautiful and cozy! Text: Best place in Lviv - cozy and ambient atmosphere, lovely music, great service and food is top-notch! Recommend burger with beetroot cutlet and grilled avocado with hollandaise sauce. My 3rd or 4th visit here and I'm definitely coming again!
Original Text: Best place in Lviv - cozy and ambient atmosphere, lovely music, great service and food is top-notch! Recommend burger with beetroot cutlet and grilled avocado with hollandaise sauce. My 3rd or 4th visit here and I'm definitely coming again!

Text: It is the first Spanish restaurant in Lviv. In terms of format it is a cocktail bar with Spanish cuisine (not to be confused with Mexican one, they are fundamentally different). Quite a nice interior. Prices are higher than average. But the main thing about this niche restaurant is the speak easy style - you can not only come here to have a dinner, but also to have a good time and spend an evening with friends. The minus of the place is the unobvious entrance. You have to go through the entrance hall and then take an elevator up to the 8th floor. The scenery from the window, however, is worth it.

Quite a nice interior. Prices are higher than average. But the main thing about this niche restaurant is the speak easy style - you can not only come here to have a dinner, but also to have a good time and spend an evening with friends. Text: Interesting location on the 8th floor in the office center. Very nice design. Spanish restaurant. The menu includes many fish dishes, as well as cool cocktails. Google maps shows a slightly incorrect location - so I advise you to call back and clarify how to get there. There is also a terrace.

A cozy place on the eighth floor of an office center. Gorgeous view of the city from the terrace. It‚Äôs a pity that we only noticed this place in November on the way from Stryisky Park, and you can‚Äôt sit on the terrace for a long time. They have an outdoor sign, which we didn‚Äôt notice for as long as we walked home from the park. Delicious food, but more like snacks for cocktails. Next time we will definitely come and taste them.
We waited a long time for the dishes, many items on the menu were not available. The paella has too little seafood for its price. It is worth coming if only to admire the sunset, it is beautiful here

Cocktails are very tasty, but the dishes we ordered were not tasty, especially üåÆ tacos with shrimp, just chopped vegetables (avocado, and tomatoes with skin and iceberg leaves), the sauce that was served with them separately was not bad. And for such prices, it is too simple, and not tasty

A very beautiful place with huge panoramic windows and a view of the opera house. That's all good and ends ;(

The menu consists of light breakfasts and snacks, in addition to this, they also have pate with an interesting story. Therefore, it was very unexpected to wait more than 50 minutes for fried eggs and pre-prepared pate from the refrigerator. We waited almost an hour and a half for hummus with meatballs, and that's all only to be told at the end that it had run out and the dish would not be available...

The turkey melt is very strange, it's hard to even call it a melt, since there is no cheese or anything to melt, but the rest of the dishes were delicious.

The same institution with a panoramic view of the Opera Houseüòç

We came here for the second time, because the tables are always occupied and there is no reservation. I have to go see üëÄ if there is a free one.
They usually sit here for a long time, chat and enjoy the view.

A beautiful and spacious establishment. Pictures on the wall. A view of the old houses of Lviv.

The dessert is delicious, the milkshake is delicious.
Normal tea and buckwheat noodles.

The service is good, the staff is friendly. Service is good üëçüèª

I liked it, I recommend it üëçüèª

Today we visited the Uno cafe, a very nice view from the window... that's where the pros of this establishment end, it's very stuffy, but that's not the main minus, the service is probably the worst in Lviv, the waitresses are very unfriendly, they silently put two glasses of water on the table, and that's it... zero communication with the guest, to make an order you have to go to the cash register or call, they didn't come themselves, coffee was prepared for a long time, the order took a long time, everything that was brought was already cold (omelet and cheesecakes, cheesecakes with frozen raspberries! ), there was still a dish missing from the menu, but we found out about it fifteen minutes later, when the waitress asked if we wanted to replace this dish, we answered that we would see, but we hadn't ordered anything yet, because until we were no longer approached! We will not go to this institution again

A very nice establishment with a cool view of the Opera House. The menu includes full meals and coffee, sweets. They took buckwheat pasta with shrimp, but waited for a very long time. Another hellish fact is that the establishment does not have its own toilet and to use the toilet in the shopping center you have to take a key from the barista :)

I love a variety of atmospheric establishments, especially those that have something to do while you wait for your order. Therefore, after reading the reviews about this one, I decided to check how bad everything was, that the opera house could not correct the situation. And from the first minutes inside, I realized that it seemed like I was reading comments for another coffee shop...
Let's start with the main, first impression, and it really affects a person, it especially affected me: a relaxed atmosphere, light notes of coffee in the air and a beautiful view outside the window - what else is needed for a pleasantly spent evening?
Okay, maybe the bad attitude from the staff is spoiling everything here? Surprisingly, no, I was immediately approached by a cute waitress (it's a shame I didn't ask her name), who helped me choose a delicious dessert, the conversation was relaxed and pleasant.
As for the kitchen, I didn't order anything like that, but they know how to make a flat white, special thanks for it. I can't really say anything about the croissant with grouper and caramel, it was tasty and tasty.
So, I liked the institution, maybe soon it will become my favorite, we will see with time.

Text:
Thanks to this institution, my evenings have become even brighter and more memorable! The sense of joy and satisfaction that I have felt while being here knows no bounds.

First of all, I want to note the professionalism and attentiveness of the staff. They are always there, ready to help and make your stay at the facility as comfortable as possible.

The atmosphere of this place is just a velvet dream! Cozy lighting, stylish design and pleasant music create an atmosphere in which you want to stay for many more hours.

As for the kitchen, it's simply masterful! Each dish is a true masterpiece that fascinates not only with its taste, but also with its exquisite presentation.

The food is very tasty, the prices are adequate. Terrible service! The waiters are not attentive and did not bring the full order, despite the fact that the hall is practically empty. The pizza was carried for more than 30 minutes, when the hall was empty. I will definitely not go again!

After visiting this institution, I was delighted! Excellent service, delicious food and a pleasant atmosphere - everything you need for a perfect evening. I recommend it with confidence - this place deserves 5 stars!

The food is delicious, but that's the only good thing about this place....
The service is very bad, the place is cold. I waited a long time for the order!!!

We visited Uno in Zbarazh today. Ordered a pizza. The taste of pizza is very tasty. But the service is such that you can hug and cry. The guy who played the role of the bartender talked as if we broke into his house without an invitation. After our order, he actually sat down to eat and started watching a video on his phone with the sound on the entire establishment. And what kind of manner is it to answer calls while turning on the loudspeaker?! As the person who was in the establishment with me said, it gives the impression that the bartender has been working for the last day and he imposed all the rules from a high mountain. Owners of the institution pay attention! Because of such employees, your business multiplies by 0. And one more note, the hall is full of urine when visitors to the establishment open the door to the restroom.
So the conclusions are as follows: if the kitchen is a priority for people and there is a stuffy nose and indifference to communication on the part of the employees of the establishment with the client, then I sincerely recommend it. But if there is also a desire for normal service and immediately before the smell of urine, then no.
The plant was closed

Text: This historical restaurant is the place where Stefan Banach, Hugo Steinhaus and other famous mathematicians would gather to talk, discuss and continue their crazy maths calculations after class. The mess was such that they ended up writing everything in a notebook instead that on the tables which made the waiters very happy. Today, there is just some photos left and a book of memories, the Cafe belongs to a Hotel and the atmosphere is nice, food is delicious and the place  worth a visit.
Original Text: This historical restaurant is the place where Stefan Banach, Hugo Steinhaus and other famous mathematicians would gather to talk, discuss and continue their crazy maths calculations after class. The mess was such that they ended up writing everything in a notebook instead that on the tables which made the waiters very happy. Today, there is just some photos left and a book of memories, the Cafe belongs to a Hotel and the atmosphere is nice, food is delicious and the place  worth a visit.

Text:
Went here kind of early for dinner around 18:30 for 2. They said starting 19:30 it'll get very busy but they'll sit us and see how it goes. This was nice, they didn't just turn is away. We ended up staying a bit longer anyways but they didn't rush us.

The waiters were nice~ we had burratat for appetizer, fusilli n'duja and osso bucco rigatoni. N'duja wasn't that spicy but overall good. (Spicy is subjective) Osso bucco was good, my date enjoyed it  (personally I found it a bit too gaimy) ~

I liked their bread, it's like pizza dough and I just wrapped it with parmesan cheese and it was very good üòã

I got a limoncello spritz, refreshing! All in all, nice evening!

Price, a bit overpriced for what you get.

Text:
Tried their vegan dishes (unfortunately they only had two) but both tasted good.
Prices are a bit more on the higher side compared to other restaurants.

The service was perfect!

The waitress also spoke good English, helped me with ordering and finding the vegan options and was in general very friendly and kind.

She must have noticed that I‚Äòm German because when she brought me the food, she said ‚ÄûGuten Appetit‚Äú, which positively surprised me ü•∞
Just a small gesture but made my day, Dankesch√∂n!

I also really like the atmosphere and the music that was playing there.

Overall I can fully recommend this restaurant.

Text:
My boyfriend and I keep returning to this restaurant every time we‚Äôre in the city. We‚Äôve tried at least half a menu at this point and every breakfast, bowl, dessert and drink that we ordered were fresh, flavourful and delicious. This place is a truly fusion restaurant.
Speaking about their coffee and alternative drinks, you can learn how to make your own drink under the supervision of their bartender Sukhrob. I appreciate the bartenders even more after the masterclasses.
Highly recommend to check it yourself.

Text:
This is GEM!
I've been visiting this place multiple times and I always come back! This means a lot.
Wanna say that this place serves very unique and delicious meals, some of them so special, that you won't find anything like that around or even in the whole country!
I think I tried 90% of their menu so far. Great thing about their menu, that you can modify dishes the way you like(if it's physically possible of course).
Must mention their professional and artistic barista Sukhrob, who can teach you how to make your own perfect coffee or cocktail.
WA Lviv using is high quality products and their menu has mostly healthy options.
You will get glass of water without asking for it, which is not common for Ukraine, so you can understand the level of service here.
There is a charging station, sockets for your laptop or just to charge your phone around each table.
Interior design is something that you would notice the moment you enter. Every once in a while they are hosting special exhibition of modern art, which is so cool!
You might also enjoy their awesome playlist.
Urban vibe and tiny details made my experience there unforgettable.
Prices are decent, servers are friendly and knowledgeable.
If you are willing to try new and delicious, you MUST visit this place - I'm highly recommending.

Text: The venue is not client-oriented at all. The waiters showed totally unprofessional. It took them 40 minutes to prepare and to offer business lunch and another 15 minutes to print the bill for lunch. The waiter showed ignorance in front of me as a client, and he said that there is no staff that is why the order was that much late, while near the cash counter there were plenty of colleagues simply chatting between them and not paying heed at all to surrounding customers. Moreover, why do you offer business lunch menu, if more than half of the dishes presented in the menus are not available? Is it just cheat customers? I do not recommend to visit this venue especially when it comes to business lunch.

Text: RACIST AND SCAMMING BAR STAFF DO NOT GO HERE!!! Unless you support right wing fascist establishments that like to scam tourists. The waitress purposely banged into both me & my brother then accused us of spilling the drink she was carrying & tried to charge us(this doesn‚Äôt happen in decent bars, most will just absorb the cost). When we refused, security then forced us to leave. They would not let me have my coat from the cloakroom unless we paid for this scam. At least two maybe three people were in on it, the others I think were innocently supporting their story. When we told someone outside they came out & tried to hush us so nobody would know. We also threatened to go to the police. Eventually we decided to just pay their scam so we could leave & get on with our night. They are sad & desperate people, I feel sorry for them. We were having such a nice evening in Lviv, Ukraine & their country folk should be ashamed of people like this. Tourists, especially non-whites should stay away from here. Just reading other reviews, they run extortion scams here. STAY AWAY!

Text:
Not a real "all you can eat" place. Don't be fooled into coming here thinking you can eat as much as you want as there are stupid rules that no all you can eat place in Western Europe, Asia or North America  or any reputable all you can eat establishment has.

FYI I went to the Kyiv main restaurant and the silly requirements such as eating all of the rice and lettuce was not required. I ate 1 kg of meat on the grill without requesting the lettuce or other condiments. Only meat and rice.

Service is great though.

I wouldn't call this an authentic Korean BBQ place. Probably the best in terms of Asian cuisine places in Ukraine, but then again any ethnic food from Asia or any other continent other than Europe are quite lacking here, but still pretty low in terms of flavor and authenticity.

Okay for the craving.

Text:
The restaurant above the candy store has always been an elegant place, with attentive service and excellent cuisine, but my last visit was on the 4th.
The babaganush is great, but it only comes in two tiny pies, so order more right away.
But the schnitzel, which this place is famous for, this time was completely disappointing, all the breading "fell off" from the meat, unfortunately I did not appreciate the potato salad, as it was dressed with a sauce with a noticeable amount of mustard and it interrupted the taste of the potatoes themselves.
Of course, sweets from the Candy Store are always good.
The waiters are very well trained, they know what to advise, but probably due to the fact that now during the renovation the Sugar Shop and the Restaurant are united in one room and there are more visitors from above, they are very busy, they have to wait a long time for a table, you have to wave your hand to attract attention, that's why this is also the nuance of the service, which I hope is temporary.
Of course, the atmosphere here is cozy, especially at the table near the window.
I really liked the institution. A gorgeous setting, very tasty food, unsurpassed desserts and exquisite service. I definitely recommend it both for breakfast and for a cup of coffee with a treat

I didn't like the brew, it's for an amateur. She was skeptical until the food was brought. Everything was very tasty. Quiet and peaceful, despite the location in the very center of the city. Attentive waiters - they didn't have time to sit down at the table, as they already brought a high chair. The institution left a pleasant impression.

Very tasty cuisine, one of the best I've tasted. Great snacks - hummus, baba ganoush, avocado mousse. Incredible Carpathian rabbit, delicious salads. The chef transforms familiar dishes into original ones that you won't try anywhere else. Cocktails and service are also top notch.
The restaurant has one drawback - it is not in Kyiv)

Good evening. For the first time in my life, I am leaving a negative review ((I did not expect that in the very center of the city in a famous candy store, my friends and I, after ordering with such enthusiasm and anticipation, would receive stale cakes. Stale is a very light word... Out of the four cakes ordered: mine "Black Forest", Ani "Blueberry Cheesecake, Oli" Meringue Kyiv, only Olena "Strawberry Cake" was fresh, as the waiter said, although the cream generally spread and did not hold its shape. Two of our cakes were weathered, visually stale, mine was chocolate the fudge has become sugary from time immemorial, the cakes are grayish-brown in color, dry, the cream has started to layer... The cheesecake had too much gelatin, the color, appearance is stale, tasteless. The meringue cake tastes more or less normal

Text: Friendly Stuff. Atmosphere good. They have very tasty Fish. I choose a different dish every visit. All the dishes I've tasted so far are delicious. Today we talked with the director about wine and he offered me a wonderful Odessa wine.(free treat). Thank you . The decoration is very beautiful. There are many places in Lviv to take photos and post them on Instagram.  There are few places with such delicious food.  I hope you will be successful and that there will be a peaceful environment in the city center where we can eat good food and drink wine for many years to come.

Place Name: Kefal π, Restoran Rodom Z Odesy
Text:
I'll start with the positives! Very nice and pleasant place! Atmosphere, music, surroundings. A very nice girl, the waiter, offered me some prosecco and promised to feed me in 20 minutes. We were a family, the children were hungry. There were few guests, but the wait for the order was 40 minutes!!! The broth and fish soup are delicious and beautiful! The red mullet was ok, but the fried bulls were hopelessly spoiled. They were absolutely tasteless, and besides, they were deep-fried and not in a frying pan, as is customary in our country. Therefore, they had a lot of excess fat, and the breading was soggy; they were not crunchy at all.
For people who had not been to their native Mariupol for 2 years, the sea fish and the atmosphere promised bliss, but it did not happen

Place Name: Kefal π, Restoran Rodom Z Odesy
Text:
I came from another city to visit this institution, and I am incredibly impressed by how comfortable it was there
Very tasty food, prosecco, extremely pleasant staff
I want to express my great gratitude to the girl Viola who served us, she told a very touching story of the establishment and recommended dishes
Given the opportunity, I would definitely like to return to this institution, and in the future visit it in its native land in Odessa ü•π

Text:
Ordered delivery to Churasco

A little while ago, I ordered delivery from Bar Mushlya, expected a delivery time of about 40 minutes, but they called me and said that due to weather conditions, the delivery time would be an hour. It didn't suit me very much, but I agreed. In the end, I waited for that delivery for 1 hour and 30 minutes! A boy arrived on a scooter. He apologized that the problem was in weather conditions. But the scooter does not stand in traffic! And the time to get to the shell showed me 40 minutes, not 90!
This refers to the time since the food was prepared, not the total time since the order was placed. Since I live outside the city, I actually sat in the car for almost an hour waiting for that delivery, and by the time we got home, everything was already cold!
I think that the delivery is poorly organized or the guys can't handle it, because they couldn't drive 90 minutes from Mushli to Pivdenny!

We visited you in Churasco. We have not tasted tastier Georgian cuisine in Lviv. The service is at a height, the kitchen is even higher.
And since it is too lazy to cook at home and go to the store in a cold December, only ZARA BUDU helps.
We ordered khinkali and khachapuri, and specialty meat.
We felt incredible bliss, very tender meat, namely wings in some very tasty marinade, also cooked on the grill.
The caesar with very tasty chicken was also drooling.
The courier delivered everything warm and intact.
Awesome cuisine, delivery, restaurant and staff.
Now you must visit Lviv
We ordered sushi on Fonvizvna, in addition to terrible rolls and stale products, we received a bone in the fish and poisoning

I often use delivery, but usually order pizza. This time I decided to try sushi
Everything was delivered on time.
In general, the sushi is normal, but the rice is a little hard and some sushi have irrelevantly cut fish. There is enough filling, the taste is not bad.

First time ordering here.
set "Autumn Sketch" and added an Ebi Tempura roll (with fried shrimp). I really liked it. Delicious! Delivery is very fast. Compared to other very famous ones, the Royal ones have soared very high. All in all, our taste buds had a blast. We didn't have time to take a photo. We will definitely order again! Thank you! Keep it up!
For 270 UAH you can add more filling. I won't buy from you again

Delicious pizza with lots of toppings. They cook quickly.
The dough is thin and very soft, the sides are not dry. We ordered Mafiosi and Okhotnichch pizza. We were pleased with the pizza. The only small caveat is that the Bavarian pizza is a little salty.
The size of the pizza is very large.

- This branch does not have the same selection of pizzas as on the website
- Essentially it‚Äôs just a small kitchen/dispensing point, everything inside doesn‚Äôt look clean, I wonder what it‚Äôs like there in the summer
- I ordered pizza with chicken and pineapples. The chicken is finely chopped into cubes, and there are pieces of pineapple nearby. The sauce is too salty. The same pizza from the buffet is much tastier and half the price.

+ Possibility to pre-order by phone, done within 20 minutes.

I've ordered sushi here a couple of times. The first time everything was good 4/5 (photo). The second was complete trash with Akiyama's 2/5 set. As for me, the filling was just smoked chicken, I laughed for a long time at the roll with ham), for the roll with fried salmon - I‚Äôm silent) I think there were sardines. Very disappointed in this store. On the website you can find vacancies for sushi chefs without salary. It's alarming =) I recommend normal restaurants such as Sushi Papa and Yaposhka, they always have fresh and very tasty sushi!!!

My friends and I ordered the ‚ÄúCompany‚Äù set (I don‚Äôt remember the exact name). Delivered in less than an hour üëèüèª Very tasty sushi. + they also gave us a spicy roll at the parküòª
All the sushi was perfectly made, there was a lot of filling, and fish too.
Overall = 5 points!
Always fast delivery and good quality products. Very tasty, reasonable prices.

We ordered delivery, the rolls were tasty and filling. The courier arrived on time.
I would also like to note that the rolls were packed in a very beautiful box, I have never seen anything like this before.
The only thing we were unhappy with was that the ginger was terribly bitter and we couldn‚Äôt eat it.
But our mood did not spoil, the rolls themselves are delicious, thank you for the delivery :)

Terrible delivery, 900 UAH down the drain! The pizza is not tasty! The sushi they brought was missing, I don‚Äôt even know how long they had it ready! I ordered it for the first time and I won‚Äôt order it again for sure!
Good pizza, good prices and really like a buffet/square

I always ordered sushi here. But the last order just killed me. As much as I love different types of sushi, but these were terrible, half of the sushi was simply spat out in the trash. Sushi with cucumber (there were only finely chopped cucumber skins inside), I always order the same set, but this one had completely different sushi, in some had strange fish inside, which everyone simply spat out. Maybe they changed the sushi, but now I don‚Äôt advise anyone to order sushi from there, otherwise you could get seriously poisoned!!!!

I don‚Äôt come here very often, not on the way, today I came with my wife and child and ordered one whole branded and one whole beef-vegetables, having previously asked to see that the pizza was fresh and not fried, since there is a comfortable room with tables, chairs and a TV, we decided to eat them on the spot, after about 10 minutes they gave us our order. The branded pizza was normal, but the beef and vegetables looked more like a burnt corner than pizza, and the smell was unappetizing. When asked about a replacement or refund, the seller returned the money without talking. In general, the place is not bad, there are a lot of visitors in the evenings, and for a small snack it‚Äôs not bad at all. Beer, juice, and soda are also available.
I stood there for 10 minutes and knocked on the window. The girl saw it, but didn‚Äôt even come up, didn‚Äôt say she was busy or anything.

Delicious pizza, reasonable price! We have been buying for a long time, you can pre-order by phone.
I recommend.
Good, tasty pizza. They cook quickly. I can't say anything bad. I buy it often.

A not very pleasant girl takes the order, all orders are written down in a notebook, there is no cash register there. The pizza is simply terrible, much worse than if you order delivery from the same company. The selection is small, only about 10 pizzas, all of them super meaty with millions of different types of meat and all the sauces in the world. In short, it just sucks, it‚Äôs better to go to Mystery or order it home

You knock and wait for a long time until they come to the window, they answer normally and TD... But when you have chosen and voiced the order in response, you hear that the wait is 40 minutes... (it‚Äôs bad that they don‚Äôt start with that). There is no place to wash your hands, no toilet, no table or chair, just everything with you... I gave it a 3 purely out of politeness to the employee and what people write is supposedly delicious.

Text:

I ordered 1 kg of pork ribs and 300 g of veal rack.
The marinade is disgusting, everything is salty, the meat is not fresh (the veal is not fresh)

I called to find out what the problem was, they said that the ribs had given off juice and the juice was also taken into account, but you know, it wasn‚Äôt included with the onions and the box 1 kg, so you better imagine the glass of juice that should have been in the box... doesn't make sense? Fraudsters and sellers of low-quality meat. I don't recommend it.

The last two visits to this bakery can be described in one word: "disappointment".
1) The order placed in advance (in 2.5 hours) and paid for is not ready, I have to wait another 45 minutes, I have not heard any apologies.
2) On 11/23/23 I bought a brownie that tasted like a not-so-fresh oatmeal cookie. I'm sorry, but a brownie shouldn't be rock hard.
It is possible that other people worked in this establishment for the first two months. If so, return them back.

I had an amazing lunch at Red Pepper üå∂Ô∏è. It is always a stop for me when visiting Lviv. Their Tom Yum is actually spicy! I also enjoyed their signature drink ‚ÄúRed Pepper‚Äù which was delicious and smooth. Today I also got a Tuna California roll and added their ‚Äúred pepper‚Äù sauce for heat which made an amazing combo. Lastly, I ordered an imperial dragon which had eel with shrimp tempura inside. A huge roll with lots of flavor and fresh ingredients. I cannot wait to return! The service provided by Orest was attentive and immaculate. He made sure to check everything was exactly how I ordered. He made sure to provide his recommendations when I asked which is the best roll. Make sure to make it a stop here whether you are staying or visiting. This is one the culinary gems of the city.

Today I also got a Tuna California roll and added their ‚Äúred pepper‚Äù sauce for heat which made an amazing combo. Lastly, I ordered an imperial dragon which had eel with shrimp tempura inside. A huge roll with lots of flavor and fresh ingredients. I cannot wait to return! The service provided by Orest was attentive and immaculate. He made sure to check everything was exactly how I ordered. He made sure to provide his recommendations when I asked which is the best roll. Make sure to make it a stop here whether you are staying or visiting. This is one the culinary gems of the city.

Text: I have been to the establishment 2 times and recommend everyone to go here for pizza. Unfortunately, you partially spoiled yesterday's order because you put rotten prosciutto in the pizza (well, the smell was stinky throughout the house). As far as I remember, that product should be put at the end of cooking, because during heat treatment it emits a stench. Also, there were only a couple of pieces of that cabbage in the kimchi pizza... In short, it was too early to advise you, but it's good that at least the cheese pizza was not spoiled. I don't know if I should go back now.

Let me start by saying that I am a regular customer of 1708 (but the one near Technopark), so I have something to compare the service and quality of the menu with.
In general, everything began to limp since the scaling of the network, because in the first two years of operation of the establishment near Technopark - I did not have any comments. All items on the menu were very tasty and interesting, and the service was the best (no exaggeration).
But that's another story... and now about the facility in Viking:
‚Ä¢ the waiters do not pay attention to you until the last moment (guests at the next table also complained about this)
‚Ä¢ the quality of the prepared dishes here is worse (the pizza was burnt, and taking into account the large edges of the dough itself, 40% of the pizza had to be left); there is enough filling in the melta so that you don't overeat sometimes, but the bread is enough, of courseüôÉ there used to be a delicious melta with kimchi and with normal chicken, not "kebab" (this kebab is a separate topic altogether, because the impression is that these are the worst scraps chicken thighs, with a large amount of not very edible elements)
‚Ä¢ and the highlight of this location is an open kitchen) where the team of cooks always clashes (using profanity); I'm not very happy to eat in the epicenter of kitchen messes, I'm sorryüôà
* the lamps on the tables never light up, because no one charges them (
I am very sorry that such a once beautiful institution is falling into the abyss of an expensive canteen :(
Please pay attention to at least a few comments, because these are not isolated cases at this location.

I visited this establishment twice and liked it both times.
I usually do not write reviews after a one-time or first visit in order to fully understand the quality level of the institution.
So: pleasant service, even before ordering we were given a glass of water, which in principle is a small thing, but nice and actually very correct.
Besides, few people do that!

Regarding the order, I read previous reviews that the pizza was dry and the filling was not of good quality or tasty. In my case, this did not happen, on the contrary, the dough was very tasty, as well as the filling, there was enough of everything, which in principle you can see in the photo!)
Separately, I want to note their sauces for sides, it‚Äôs like mast-hev for me) I came at 1708, took a pizza, so there must be a sauce for sides, you can‚Äôt refuse this, especially basil üåø

In the photo, it may seem that we did not add basil a little, but no, I ate it, because it was already very fragrant!üòÑ

Tasteless. Not cheap and tasteless. The pizza is banally dry, with few ingredients. Huge baguette-sized (tasteless) pizza sides from the nearby silpo. Ordered al salmone (large pizza for two). Conclusion: for this money I expected more, pizza "didn't get me high"
Ordered a bowl from a nutritionist, waited more than 40 minutes. The bowl was not tasty and very dry. The waiters made no effort to improve the waiting time or at least warn about it.

Nice children's area, clean, tasty, good toilet, good design. But it's still somehow not so comfortable, probably because the place is still "fresh".

Great coffee, pastries, service.
A little secret location, which is why there are not many visitors.

Imagine how delicious it would be if I went from Ryasne-2 to buy pastries in "Krymska Perepichka". The best samsa in Lviv, delicious kubete, Swiss bread, Spartak cake. This time I came out without eclairs, so as not to overdo it, but these are the most delicious eclairs in my life.

Text:
A delicious place in our area :)
I am not coming here for the first time, because there are not many establishments on Pasichnaya, so this is a great comfort for the whole district.
A simple cafe, without tricks, where, however, everything is very tasty.
I liked that the waitress advised what was better to try and could tell which of the dishes had the best taste.
We tried the roast beef with green butter, it was really cool! But the minus is 3 croutons to it, for such a portion you need to add at least one more.
Pumpkin soup was also delicious, thick, with nuts and bacon.
We also tried entrecote, tender meat and excellent mashed potatoes "just like mom's".
In a word, simple and very tasty, thank you very much!

The cuisine is delicious, the service is good, but the establishment needs to be updated (the premises need restoration), the menu would like to be updated, something new added, for so long the same thing on the menu.

Text: This cafe makes the best pastries and cakes using the highest quality of ingredients...you can tell this from just one bite! I say this as a picky person. Hands down, Honey cafe is a must visit on any occasion. Their eclairs are simply exquisite with the filling done right, and a balance of flavours. The chocolate and berry eclairs are particularly decadent...not too sweet, just perfect. Another thing that I admire about this place are the staff. The service is warm, friendly, and just simply professional. I particularly want to thank Alexander from TSUM Honey cafe. He is the loveliest person who is super friendly, an expert in taste, and always greets me with a smile when I drop by for my coffee. I also recommend French Kiss cake that comes in the small or large version! I picked up an order of the French Kiss cake for my mum's birthday today and I'm absolutely thrilled with the professional service, craftsmanship, and the taste palette of this cake. If you want a light and fruity treat, French Kiss is literally "chef's kiss"! Thank you to the top manager for organising a swift delivery and for catering to my needsüôè üôå I really appreciate your help. I look forward to ordering more cakes in the future ‚ù§Ô∏è

The chocolate and berry eclairs are particularly decadent...not too sweet, just perfect. Another thing that I admire about this place are the staff. The service is warm, friendly, and just simply professional. I particularly want to thank Alexander from TSUM Honey cafe. Text:
Every time I‚Äôve been in Kyiv I have paid at least 1 trip to honey, and I think I will continue to do so.

The savoury dishes are great breakfast  options and the coffee is good, but the confectionary is definitely the best reason to visit.

The flavour combinations, the presentation and the creativity of all their sweet options make them a great choice compared to other places. I think the choices of flavours and ingredients are the perfect balance of great taste without being overpoweringly sweet and sickly

Text:
We dropped in the cafe accidently. All tables were booked, we were lucky to catch the table had became free after previous visitors.
The place is small but very atmospheric.
The breakfast is amazingly tasty. Croissants, Benedict eggs, avocado toast, French omelet it's must-to-eat for breakfast. But it was only the beginning. Pastichery... well... you just need to taste...
The Honey is very much recommended.

Text:
Outstanding food and service! We came for a dessert and then ended up returning the next morning for breakfast. Epic number of choices for desserts - special shout out to the lovely guy behind the counter who kindly described each of them to us in English :). Each one is delicious and a complete work of art.
The breakfast menu (which they have in English - photos attached as I had trouble finding it online before we went) is extensive and has something for everyone. Everything we ate there was excellent, and my flat white was one of the best I‚Äôve had in one month in Eastern Europe so far :)

Text: It‚Äôs a point of destination for any mousse cake lover! They have a good selection of mousse cakes, but not limited by them. It‚Äôs also a great place to have a breakfast. Honestly, I love ‚ÄúHoney‚Äù on Yaroslaviv Val Street the most, but I‚Äôm glad they opened another restaurant on Podil as well.

Text: An incredible place! I come here to eat again. She even celebrated her birthday here. Thanks for such great memories!! The food is always at the highest level and is prepared very quickly, without delays. The staff is very friendly and attentive. And the atmosphere is unforgettable. Now I am your regular guest‚ù§Ô∏è

definitely my favorite place. good location, pleasant atmosphere, neat and friendly staff; Georgian-style restaurant, cozy; clean and shiny dishes, and most importantly - incredibly tasty dishes, I really liked the Megrelian khachapuri and four cheeses. I recommendüëçüèª

Unfortunately, I am completely disappointed today. I reserved a table for a birthday celebration, because I always liked this place for its atmosphere and delicious khachapuri.
Today, unfortunately, this did not happen - we waited for food for about 30-40 minutes, under the condition that the seating was not complete, they brought khinkali, later khachapuri, the cheese in them was absolutely not salty, and the overall impression of the dishes was not the best :( objectively, the food was not tasty, quite a long wait, considering that I always take khachapuri here and know its classic taste here)
I liked only the chicken shish kebab, but after half an hour of waiting and a not cheap check, it was a real disappointment. The waiter's reaction to this remark was somewhat sarcastic, and nothing was offered in return, in general 5 stars for the atmosphere and "branded" greeting from the staff, and gratitude to the girl who met and led to the table. It used to be one of the favorite Georgian restaurants in Lviv, but today üëéüèª
If you dream of the atmosphere of Tbilisi and feel the hospitality of Georgia, this is the place for you. I recommend rack of lamb, ribs in orange sauce and khinkali. And tarragon!!!

Biggest disappointment in a long time. I don't feel like going to a restaurant at all, it's a cafe, going once is already too much... Food +-, although I liked only one of the 3 dishes - khachapuri, the meat is very mediocre. But the atmosphere is the bottom. The tables are placed in such a way that it is simply impossible to reach some, and on others people sit almost on top of each other and disturb the staff. When this was pointed out to the manager of the "restaurant", she did not even admit that there were problems and did not try to improve the impression of the establishment and only offered to move now. This despite the fact that they booked a table more than a week in advance, and gave the worst option even though there were others free! The music is playing very loudly and three times we asked to make it quieter, because we couldn't hear each other, it only helped for a while, because it was the manager who came and made it louder. Absolute disappointment, the establishment is not worthy of being called a restaurant
Tasty food and great service - definitely recommend.
Original Text: Tasty food and great service - definitely recommend.

Text:
My wife and I had some tacos and nachos here. Pretty good, overpriced. Way too many toppings on the tacos for the tiny tortillas, so they are guaranteed to break and make a mess. The nachos had a cheesy seasoning, basically Doritos.

There aren't many Mexican places in Ukraine which aren't terrible, so it's worth a visit.

They have vegetarian tacos.

Text: Amazing place, the bartender was extremely helpful-helping us choosing what we would like to drink even though we had no clue about Mexican alcohol. The staff was really friendly and down to earth and I felt like they put a lot of effort into preparing those beautiful drinks. In addition the man serving us spoke really good polish which made the whole experience easier. Definitely a must if you're visiting Lviv and feel like having some delicious cocktails.

Text: It is a bright Latin American bar where there is always an atmosphere of celebration, Cuban dancing and Mexican fervor, and tequila is flowing like a river. Facility's main drinks are tequila and mescal. The cocktail list accentuates classic cocktails with Latin American twists. Also on the list are micheladas and chupitos shots. To accompany the drinks, tacos, nachos and ceviche are served here. All in all a rather atmospheric place with great music, delicious cocktails and cheerful and positive bartenders! However, sometimes visitors can be a bit heavy on alcohol and get noisy.

Text:
This place charmed me with its atmosphere and the beauty of the street. Small and cozy tables are located on the terrace in summer. I came for breakfast early in the morning, the cafe was just opening. I was the first customer, but in just a couple of minutes 30% of the tables were filled with people. I ordered breakfast and coffee, it was prepared very quickly. I was pleasantly surprised.
I wasn‚Äôt in the middle of the cafe, but I think it‚Äôs also very cozy there, just like outside. It was cool early in the morning, the waiter took care of me and brought me a blanket.
The waiter did not bother me, as is sometimes customary. I liked it all very much. I‚Äôm really looking forward to the summer so I can go to this cafe again and enjoy the moment. Thank you.

Text:
We ordered borscht with dumplings. On the website, it says that the portion is 400 grams, they respected it, but in fact it is only 340. But all the dumplings are undercooked

I add:
I consider this answer to the feedback incorrect
Why is the weight of each portion indicated in the menu? Is it possible that you do not pay attention to the quantity and weight when you order a product? Why do I have to pay extra for being underweight? You write like that about valuing work, I also work for the money that I use to pay for my orders
Showed your answer to my friend, he also laughed because he tried your borscht with dumplings and it was also terrible

We recommend! The Sambir district organization of the Red Cross Society of Ukraine has been cooperating with "Old city" for a long time. Everything is on time, quality service, very tasty cuisine and open to cooperation!

A little away from the center. But beautiful and tasty. My colleague liked the dumplings with a bang, and I savored the ‚Äúhomemade‚Äù pasta. The girls waiters are positive and serve quickly. Recommended to visit when visiting the glorious town of Sambir :-)

Went there at lunchtime on Sunday. Everything was brought quickly, I took their pasta with bacon and chicken, the chicken turned out to be undercooked, I told this to the waitress, she shrugged her shoulders and just left, understanding the quality of service, I still tasted the pasta without chicken, it turned out to be delicious) The salad in the basket was normal.

A very good institution. Quite a varied menu. Everything that was eaten,,,,, was quite deliciously prepared. Ribs are enough and quite tasty. I recommend it to all gourmets. Prices are adequate. To be honest, I didn't think that somewhere in the Lviv region there could still be tastier "Rubtsi" than in Sambor. Thank you "COOKS" very, very tasty.
Well done!!!

Long delivery - 1.5 hours. The baked roll arrived cold, and the taste was 1 out of 5.
There is a lot of filling in the rolls, but the taste is not bright or rich.
There is very little ginger compared to other deliveries.
The price is above average, but absolutely not justified considering all the previous points.
The roles are big, they look good, but that's all from the pros. Unfortunately, I did not enjoy the purchaseüò¨
I do not recommend it, there are much better options for delivery.

I am very surprised that, unlike Instagram, there are so few reviews of this delivery. They really have a lot to praise. First, fresh and high-quality products are always used. Secondly, it is impossible not to get aesthetic pleasure from these roles, it is clear that every time a soul is put in!) And most importantly, TASTE! The word "unsurpassed" is the most suitable here, because really since the first time these roles were tried, others compared to them... Well, others do not compare with them! You just have to try it)) Now no celebration is complete without our favorite roles ;) The price is a little higher than the average, but they are worth every hryvnia.

Extremely tasty rolls!!!
A perfect combination of ingredients, all the components of the roll are felt) And Tuna ROll is my TOP #1
Unsurpassed taste and quality!!!
Everything is done down to the details, the packaging is very nice and high-quality, everything looks very aesthetic.
My friends and I order only this delivery and I only recommend it to EVERYONE, because I am sure that everyone will be satisfied!
EVERYTHING AT THE HIGHEST LEVEL: presentation, taste! one feels that everything is made with love
Thank you for such deliciousness!
I'm with you from the beginning :)
and who hasn't tried it yet - definitely try it!

Love this delivery!üî•
Huge sushi, a lot of fillings, good prices and unreal taste!üòç

Very tasty and cozy. I recommend trying a set of snacks. And very tasty mussels with shrimps.

I came here to  explore native Ukrainian tastes, and while mead-based alcohols were good - I have small problem with the food.
Trout on the vegetables was delicious but served just 5 minutes after the soup, so I was still eating soup while trout was getting colder every minute.
Have the staff had basic understanding or training? Or just I strutted to serve ASAP. (BTW. when I was at the restaurant it was almost empty...)
As I said, trout was really good, but soup - nope. It was flat, battery, even after adding ful bowl of condiment it was served with.
Local is focused on selling mead related products, including alcohols.
But ordering food is a 50/50 chance...
I'm disappointed and wouldn't recommend to fellow travelers.

definitely my favorite place. good location, pleasant atmosphere, neat and friendly staff; Georgian-style restaurant, cozy; clean and shiny dishes, and most importantly - incredibly tasty dishes, I really liked the Megrelian khachapuri and four cheeses. I recommendüëçüèª

Unfortunately, I am completely disappointed today. I reserved a table for a birthday celebration, because I always liked this place for its atmosphere and delicious khachapuri.
Today, unfortunately, this did not happen - we waited for food for about 30-40 minutes, under the condition that the seating was not complete, they brought khinkali, later khachapuri, the cheese in them was absolutely not salty, and the overall impression of the dishes was not the best :( objectively, the food was not tasty, quite a long wait, considering that I always take khachapuri here and know its classic taste here)
I liked only the chicken shish kebab, but after half an hour of waiting and a not cheap check, it was a real disappointment. The waiter's reaction to this remark was somewhat sarcastic, and nothing was offered in return, in general 5 stars for the atmosphere and "branded" greeting from the staff, and gratitude to the girl who met and led to the table. It used to be one of the favorite Georgian restaurants in Lviv, but today üëéüèª
If you dream of the atmosphere of Tbilisi and feel the hospitality of Georgia, this is the place for you. I recommend rack of lamb, ribs in orange sauce and khinkali. And tarragon!!!

Biggest disappointment in a long time. I don't feel like going to a restaurant at all, it's a cafe, going once is already too much... Food +-, although I liked only one of the 3 dishes - khachapuri, the meat is very mediocre. But the atmosphere is the bottom. The tables are placed in such a way that it is simply impossible to reach some, and on others people sit almost on top of each other and disturb the staff. When this was pointed out to the manager of the "restaurant", she did not even admit that there were problems and did not try to improve the impression of the establishment and only offered to move now. This despite the fact that they booked a table more than a week in advance, and gave the worst option even though there were others free! The music is playing very loudly and three times we asked to make it quieter, because we couldn't hear each other, it only helped for a while, because it was the manager who came and made it louder. Absolute disappointment, the establishment is not worthy of being called a restaurant
