Place Name: Kefal π, Restoran Rodom Z Odesy
Text:
I'll start with the positives! Very nice and pleasant place! Atmosphere, music, surroundings. A very nice girl, the waiter, offered me some prosecco and promised to feed me in 20 minutes. We were a family, the children were hungry. There were few guests, but the wait for the order was 40 minutes!!! The broth and fish soup are delicious and beautiful! The red mullet was ok, but the fried bulls were hopelessly spoiled. They were absolutely tasteless, and besides, they were deep-fried and not in a frying pan, as is customary in our country. Therefore, they had a lot of excess fat, and the breading was soggy; they were not crunchy at all.
For people who had not been to their native Mariupol for 2 years, the sea fish and the atmosphere promised bliss, but it did not happen

I left my tartar half eaten. We came to the bar to pay and mentioned that closing time should be visible, mentioned in advance and so on. Also added that tartare was a bit over peppered - he just said i will tell to the kitchen.
The restraunt is positioning itself as high quality and service - no, its not about them

Text: It's hard to tell how you end up finding this place. First, your local friends tell you with great passion about liquors and spirits your imagination can't even imagine and you toung starts feeling an almost primal, visceral urge to try it. Then, you came to Lviv, in a quest of taste and drinking pleasures, and visit this place. It's not big, nor small - cozy, almost like home is how you feel it. Then you see a menu and order what seems to be an ordinary set here. You have no expectations, no biases, and start trying... And then, images of the wildest foods, tastes from a childhood, moms dishes and medicine you were guilty to like. But now, you allow yourself to enjoy it to it's litteral bottom. You order more, and just drink how it supposed to be - for a taste, experience, feeling, not just a raw booze. So, I don't know should i say more. If you are a person who is tired of drinking boring things - come here - you will have a drinking experience this country should be proud to have!
Original Text: It's hard to tell how you end up finding this place. First, your local friends tell you with great passion about liquors and spirits your imagination can't even imagine and you toung starts feeling an almost primal, visceral urge to try it. Then, you came to Lviv, in a quest of taste and drinking pleasures, and visit this place. It's not big, nor small - cozy, almost like home is how you feel it. Then you see a menu and order what seems to be an ordinary set here. You have no expectations, no biases, and start trying... And then, images of the wildest foods, tastes from a childhood, moms dishes and medicine you were guilty to like. But now, you allow yourself to enjoy it to it's litteral bottom. You order more, and just drink how it supposed to be - for a taste, experience, feeling, not just a raw booze. So, I don't know should i say more. If you are a person who is tired of drinking boring things - come here - you will have a drinking experience this country should be proud to have!

Text: A good cafe where you can eat quickly and deliciously. Ready-made dishes to your taste and choice are put on your plate, dishes have one price per 100 gr. balance. The staff is polite and friendly.

The cafe is located in King's Cross on the second floor. Everything is ready, it remains only to heat it up. All dishes cost UAH 27 per 100 grams. In general, it is not bad, there is a large selection of both meat and vegetable dishes. The pumpkin was peppered, everything else was quite tasty.

The dishes are not very tasty. Everything was oversalted. A photo of potatoes, that is, salt, and then I add potatoes!

I witnessed how the waiter or the cook poured the dishes into those large containers, which were on the counter and at the foot of the table, where the salad was spilled, and then also the potatoes. I made a remark that all the food was lying on the tables, and the waiter picked it all up with his hand and threw it to the rest of the food! That is, in front of my eyes, he picked up the food that fell on the dirty table at his feet and threw it into the container from where customers collect their meals! It's just horrible. If they allow themselves to do this in front of a client, then it means that it is the norm for them, and in the kitchen, probably even more trash is made!
I do not recommend trying anything there!

Text:
DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY HERE. I can't understand how this place has 4 stars but I was disappointed on almost every aspect of our stay, which we cut short due to the horrible treatment we received. I will list a few to warn other travelers so they don't make the same mistake we did in booking this location:
1) The AC didn't work at all the first night and the manager cussed us out when we insisted it be turned on the second night (it was switched off which I can't understand- it's August for crying out loud and very hot outside!).
2) The price includes breakfast. The meal was poor, with little variety and despite only 3 families present to eat, the cereals were low or empty, no bowls for the cereal so we used a coffee cup, jelly jar was empty, and no fruit or vegetables available, the eggs burned and a few hotdogs instead of sausage or bacon given for protein. And when asked for the items to be refilled or a substitute given, our requests were dismissed or completely ignored.
3) The listing claims to have a pool which is one of the reasons we choose this location. We could not swim however due to the lack of treatment of the water (yucky green and murky) and the cold temperature despite the hot weather outside.
4) The room stank terribly of bleach and detergent upon our arrival- so much so we had to air out the suite for several hours before we could become comfortable.
5) Halls and stairwell were dark and when we'd turn the light on to walk downstairs, the manager would come behind us and turn them off. Also turned the light off on us both times we ate in the dining room. Very rude.
The list continues and we've filed our complaint but I hope everyone is warned. We found a different hotel and there enjoyed the rest of our vacation. It wasn't possible to do that at Siesta Pension.

Text:
The owner uses booking.com for overbooking Siesta Panzio, and after that he move guests to other locations, where they don't have breakfast, no hot water, no functional TV, no internet; unclean bedlinings, rusty bathroom furniture, very unclean toilets.
After we made a complaint about the situation on booking.com, he came to bring us towels at 10 pm. He just entered the room without not even knocking at the door. He said he would take us out if we do not pay him immediately; and this, considering we had 3 children sleeping at that time. Please avoid this property.

Worst experience ever!! I was so disappointed, we booked room for one night (supposed to be 2nights). We booked one room for 2 adults and one kids. I expected things to be better than this.
- When we arrived there was no receptionist standing by at all more than 1 hour we have been waiting.
- no curtain in the bathroom and people can see you from the opposite side.
- cannot pay with credit card only cash (we found out when we checked out **currency exchange rate is different when you cash out from the atm machine and you have to pay more than you supposed to‚òπÔ∏è)
- no hanger not even one in the closet.
- no hair dryer in the bathroom.
- room was so dirty didnt look like on the website at all.
- not prepared  for 3 guests (no pillow case, blanket, towels.. even we gave information that will be 3 people)
- no security standards ( didn't checked passports or ID at all )
- no Covid-19 standards as shown on the web page.
And many more things not professional.
Strongly not recommending for visit at all!!!

Text:
We (me and my gf) bought a package for 2pax for 3 nights. Hotel is very conveniently located, just 3mins.walk to the electric railway station "Sibir" and has enough parking spaces even when the place is busy. As we were staying longer than 2nights, we got a Tatry Card which entitled us to many discounts (cable car fares, food, drinks...) and unlimited free travel on the local electric railway system. Those trains(trams) were getting us daily to the local places of interest (mountains) so, two of us saved a great deal of EURos there.

There was a wedding party on our arrival so, we got conveniently offered a room on the 3rd (top) floor with lift(elevator) so, were not disturbed by any of the party noise. Our room 305 was clean and tidy with beautiful mountain views. There were a few scars on the walls and the towel hook was broken but I do not see this as a big deal. Everything else was working and well taken care of.

The service was outstanding, all the staff were very friendly, cheerful and always happy to help. We think they have done a great deal of work to make our stay pleasant and enjoyable. All of them including the kitchen staff deserve big thanks. Especially helpful was Patrik, one of the reception staff. Once a day, we could use the finish sauna and jacuzzi as a part of our package which was great after some long mountain walks. We stayed in the sauna a bit longer in the evenings but the staff did not mind. We think that the jacuzzi room would do with some door as it feels kind of strange when someone is playing a table tennis behind the shower curtain whilst we were having a relaxing bath. :)

We had tasteful breakfasts and dinners every day. Breakfasts were in the form of a buffet, all fresh and enough to keep us going until afternoon. All 3 dinners including the soups were delicious and freshly made. The desserts were a little bit weaker than the whole menu but still good.

The internet access is WiFi only and you have to be close to the reception/restaurant to get a free access. We did not come to surf the internet all day so, it was fine to sit downstairs at the bar. Just an hour before our departure, we experienced a short drop in the water pressure but I believe this might have been due to the high local water demand (often seen in remote mountain resorts).

We would definitely come again and recommend this place to people coming to make the most of the Tatry mountains for an affordable price a spend the evenings in a friendly hotel. Great for couples, friends, families with kids, eldery people

Very tasty cuisine based on years of home recipes. Meat okroshka is apparently the best in Uzhgorod. And the seasonal dish Gazpacho is absolutely divine. Text: The bar and the decor is nice, the drinks good but the service wipes it all clean and only a bad experience remains. You have to buzz the waiter to order, but the buzzer either does not work or they deliberately ignore it. It took us ages fo get the first order and we couldn‚Äôt order the second round no matter how hard we tried. The staff ignored the buzzer and walked around the room avoiding eye contact. The first round of drinks was terribly served. Despite both of us ordering the same simple cocktail, mine arrived more than 10 minutes after my boyfriend‚Äôs. There are better bars in Lviv, don‚Äôt bother with the Secret Bar

Gyoza were tasty, but I didn't like the rest at all ;(
The rice for Mongolian bifu is very crumbly and cannot be eaten with chopsticks, the wok is burnt ;(

In general, you can visit once, but it is quite difficult to recommend ;(

I often visit Asian cuisine establishments, and this establishment is definitely worthy of your attention!
No pretentious signs or arrogance, reasonable prices with very tasty cuisine and snacks, broken cucumbers, separate varnish and adequate and cool service. Definitely like it, thank you)

I am familiar with this establishment, even from their previous location, so you compare anyway.
It's always delicious, especially their rich soups, which don't spare a sea of ‚Äã‚Äãcilantro.
However, the previous establishment was perceived more for relaxation, here it is purely a dining room atmosphere: come, eat, leave, and this is rather a minus.
A great option for a quick, tasty snack in the center.

today I tasted the pho bo, which was praised to me, but the expectations were not fulfilled at all :(
very cloudy broth and meat as if a cat had cried.
kimchi, pickled cucumbers, asparagus beans - it was delicious, I liked the service, the girls are nice and friendly, but unfortunately the pho was the most disappointing.
also, I was surprised by the already darkened basil in the plate, it doesn‚Äôt look very good)

I managed to visit this restaurant "Good People".
It's about comfort and coziness. You can retire to a corner, on a soft sofa, or sit by the window or the children's room.
I liked the cocktails and the cuisine.
The children's menu is especially delicious.
I liked the saxophonist, who created an unreal pleasant atmosphere in the institution.
Keep it up ‚ù§Ô∏è

The menu needs to be worked on. The selection is small, if you are a vegetarian, then there is nothing for you to eat there. The potatoes were so fatty that you could survive the oil on them, and we waited for them for an hour, despite the fact that the hall was empty except for a small banquet, the meat in the salad was dry, the salad was not tasty at all. Some items were not on the menu. We expected better, but the institution did not live up to expectations.

After visiting this restaurant, I was impressed by everything from the excellent service to the excellent culinary skills. First of all, I want to note the friendly staff, who create a very cozy and hospitable atmosphere. The delicious dishes served in this establishment leave an unforgettable impression. The ingredients used are fresh and exquisite, and the chefs have shown extraordinary creativity in creating each dish. I recommend trying their main dishes, especially their desserts are impressive. The atmosphere and flavors you will find here will surely create unforgettable moments for you. I look forward to coming back here again.

A cozy place, not yet well-known, which I consider a significant advantage. A wide selection of cocktails and incredibly tasty dishes (for which you should wait a little)
In general, I was very satisfied.
I was in that part of the city for the first time on my own business, but now I will 100% be there more often. Very tasty cuisine and friendly staff. They have incredible cocktails

Furthermore, the performance (like torture or punishment) with the executioner and a guest being introduced  in a medieval cage was peculiar and fun.

Text: Food is not tasty and does not worth its money. Will never visit it again.
Original Text: Food is not tasty and does not worth its money. Will never visit it again.

Text:
My wife and I have already visited La Famiglia twice and I want to say that so far we have only had positive emotions.
Pizza Caesarini (4/5), today we tasted "Korida" (4/5).
It's delicious, everything is fine, the choice is nice, but they still haven't chosen the one that's definitely delicious.
There are several salads in the assortment,
Salad with veal tongue and beetroot mousse (4/5) - delicious.
Today we decided to order "Salad with camembert cheese and honey mustard dressing" (5/5), extremely tasty.
We also tried today "Tempura chicken (cheese sauce)" (3/5), it seemed greasy, at least it would not be superfluous to soak it a little with a napkin before serving (
Drinks - whatever they cost - everything was delicious. The assortment is very large and it seems to me that everything is delicious.
I recommend the establishment, I will recommend it to friends, but so far without anything extraordinary)

Thank you, it was very tasty. If there was an opportunity to put six stars, then immediately put it. My friends and I had a nice and tasty meal in an atmospheric restaurant with really delicious Italian cuisine, pastas and salads are especially well put together. The alcohol menu is truly impressive. The understanding waiters will help you choose a meal to go with your drinks. Thank you very much for the wonderful moments at La Familia

It is a pity that the level of service is so low.
I fully understand that it is a weekend, and the number of guests may be higher, so why not put more staff on shift?
We ordered 3 beers, 2 pizzas and 1 portion of antipasti.
In a few minutes they brought beer, after 15 minutes pizza, after another 5 we were served a table, but the antipasti was never brought, although we were counting on it before the pizza.
After some time, the administrator came to clear the table, we clarified how long we would have to wait for the antipasti, what was the answer, whether we had ordered it at all and how long ago.
It was clear that the waitress had simply forgotten to punch in our order completely.
Having spent another good 10 minutes waiting, I had to refuse the meal, because the cut, which is prepared at 100% occupancy of the establishment, takes up to 15 minutes, but no more.

We stopped here for dinner, the choice of this place turned out to be random (we were guided by reviews on google maps), the first obstacle we faced was the location of the restaurant, it is difficult to find it because the location on the map does not correspond to the actual stay. But we are stubborn people, so after looking around we still found him. We recommend that owners install additional billboards or adjust location information. Everything about the interior is very decent: nice, clean, design in modern motifs. The waiter is polite, took the order quickly, navigated the menu, served the dishes on time. I can't say that the menu is big, there aren't many dishes. We chose broth for the first course, and pork steak with potatoes and veal medallions with mushroom sauce for the second course. Everything was tasty, the meat was cooked well, the design of the dish could have looked more restaurant-like, but it did not affect the taste in any way. Prices are standard, as for this type of establishment. In general, we are satisfied, maybe we will come back to try your oysters) A pleasant bonus was a flyer for a 10% discount on the next visit)
Very friendly staff, excellent service, which is a rarity in Polonyna Flower. Delicious borscht, dumplings, cherry dumplings. I want to come back here again‚ù§Ô∏è

How cool that an establishment with such delicious food appeared in Solochyna near Kvitka Polonyna! We have been vacationing here for many years, but food has always been a problem. Delicious food and good service, the menu has various dishes for all tastes! Bograch with a record amount of meat and very tasty pizza. And cold prosecco)))

very nice staff, good atmosphere.
I just have a note regarding the meat. good cooking and presentation. but unfortunately the meat is tasteless. maybe some seasoning or marinade would fix it. unfortunately there is not enough sauce

I will write honestly, the institution has room to grow. But we were in the summer when the institution was just starting its work. The staff is not yet permanent, the menu is being tested.
But I will 100% come back if I'm there again. The atmosphere is very cozy. Owners and managers try to take feedback, what is liked, what is not. Most dishes are very tasty.
We lived in the complex where the institution is located, so we went there many times. Both for breakfast and dinner, in addition, the establishment serves by the pool when it's warm. I don't like oysters (a feature of the establishment), so I didn't taste them, but my friend said they were very fresh and tasty.
My husband knows cheese and was very surprised that such expensive cheeses are put in the pizza, this is the level when quality products are selected, and they do not want to save on everything. I wish you development! Well done to you for sincerely listening to reviews.
Good Ukrainian cuisine, friendly service and Ukrainian music live played at the tables. We visited the restaurant 2021 before the war. I hope it could continue as it was.
Original Text: Good Ukrainian cuisine, friendly service and Ukrainian music live played at the tables. We visited the restaurant 2021 before the war. I hope it could continue as it was.

Text: Very friendly service and delicious food. They have a great wine selection with reasonable prices. Everything is cooked to order so some things like steak or veal might take longer so don't be in a hurry. Plan to hang out for awhile. If you want a fun show order a Sambuca!
Original Text: Very friendly service and delicious food. They have a great wine selection with reasonable prices. Everything is cooked to order so some things like steak or veal might take longer so don't be in a hurry. Plan to hang out for awhile. If you want a fun show order a Sambuca!

Text:
Came here with my girl Friday at 19:00. Nice atmosphere. They had a violinist and accordion players come to our table. Prices were about normal for Lviv. Good staff. Outlets at each table for charging phones. The menu is in English as well.

But.  The food took a looong time and they weren't busy. The mackerel tasted wrong. The waiter said that's how it should taste but my girl couldn't eat it so we ordered another plate of potato pancakes. They were pretty good but the first order was cooked different, so obviously the chef isn't paying close attention tonight. My trout tasted good.

I probably won't come back, but overall my experience was ok.

Text: At the entrance is an advertisement with a promotion. When you try to order a promotional offer, it turns out that it has not been available for a long time. At the same time, the staff refuses to erase 1+1=3 and continues to mislead people.

Well, not that the bottom. But it is not at all tasty, the burger was brought with a semi-RAW cutlet, not everyone likes it, even if it is beef. The burger is undersalted, there is almost no taste. Store ketchup is added, which is very noticeable and not tasty. The cutlet in the onion burger is thin (as in the poppy seed cheeseburger). I was expecting a classic burger (with a cutlet 1.5-2 cm thick). In short, tasteless, either lower the price or improve the burgers. After all, burgers are quite fast food, but they should not be tasty. I will not come again.

I visited this institution more than once with my friends. Everything in the kitchen is delicious, the burgers are just amazing... there are no issues with the service either.
I will continue to be a regular guest of this establishment. Well done!

There are 4 people in the establishment who are already eating burgers, and a new order for a burger has to wait 20 minutes, despite the fact that there are 4 people in the kitchen))) a little long, considering the time of frying the patties, well, a maximum of 7 minutes)
I can imagine how long you will have to wait for a burger if the restaurant is full)

Unfriendly staff. They promised to fulfill the order of two burgers in 15-20 minutes, as a result, they expected more than 50 minutes. After the first visit, the impressions were better, after a month the quality of service deteriorated sharply

Super tasty burgers and wine! Looks not as in menu, but it does not matter.
They have a good variety of wine, so you can try different.
A bit overpriced,  but as it is the center of the city I can live with it))
Stuff is good.

They were passing through Lviv and stopped on land. I want to say that we ate sushi a lot. And in Europe as well. But we have never met tastier than here. Sushi, like rice porridge, has no shape and looks like a bunch of different products. Delicious!
Always excellent service, the freshest sushi, product range updates, satisfied with every order, as well as a nice system of bonuses for which you can order your favorite rolls, thank you for your work! Just not likeness, waiting time 2 hours.

Bottom

Text: Sushi Time is a great place for sushi fans. Their dishes are always fresh, high-quality and tasty. The service is always friendly and fast. I recommend everyone who loves Japanese cuisine to come here and taste the best rolls and sashimi in town.

I ordered a Big Kush set for dinner, for two people (we did not have dinner). I took a self-pickup from the institution, quite a profitable offer.

Without a doubt, I will say that it is delicious here. I am more than satisfied with the order and this time I did not regret that I ordered from a new establishment.

For this price segment, these rolls have enough filling. I thought one roll was slightly salty, but in general the rolls are tasty, although some do not have a strong taste. The set also included 5 types of gunkan and 3 types of nigiri. Since I never bought them, this was one of the reasons why I decided to take this set. Gunkans are somewhat neutral to me, but nigiri are very tasty.

There are no complaints about the service. The wait was said to be up to 80 minutes, I arrived ~ 65 minutes later and the order was already waiting for me. I want to note that enough soy sauce was given, not as some unscrupulous companies like to do. As I understand, the institution only recently opened in Lviv and I hope to continue at the same pace.

Honestly, I was impressed with the taste of sushi, because I tried more expensive ones and they tasted worse. And here the price is affordable and it's deliciousüòç I'm not surprised why people keep ordering them from you ü§≠

We ordered for lunch for two people: the Fish Time set and the Hit Price Friday set.

I liked the omelette rolls and the avocado roll. The sauce and wasabi/ginger were generously given, even though they knew it was enough for two people.

Received the order in 67 minutes (promised between 60-90 minutes).

This is the third attempt to order rollers here, the first two asked to pay extra for delivery, although the website promises free delivery for my location for orders over 500. After the third attempt, I was satisfied. Maybe I would still advise when the operator calls to clarify how much sauce/wasabi/ginger is provided for free and whether I need that much, I would take less than they give, because I won't use it all anyway.

@natalee.ts

In principle, I had to taste the worst roles.

They responded to the complaint by giving -10% on the next order.
Seriously? I would not take such roles again for free.
Such establishments have no right to exist! Because it's terrible!

Ordered two sets for lunch, delivery took about 1 hour and 10 minutes. The sushi was amazing in taste and richness, and some pieces contained fresh fish, which I don't eat that often because of my fears. Here it is worth noting that raw fish was not on all rolls, so I decided to taste a little bolder. The order was for two people and I was pleasantly surprised that they provided enough soy sauce, wasabi and ginger. Although Fish Time lost a bit to the Hit Price Friday set, both sets left a good impression, and I would happily order them again.

Took a "mega" set of 1.5 kg for a sample......
Buy better for this money kebabs, chebureks or a small sushi set from the establishment (it starts with O, ends with A), you will get much more pleasure. You just get rice, lots of rice, lots of rice and almost no toppings. The only thing that was more or less interesting in taste was the "Krabik Hot roll". p.s. I paid for the order immediately on the website, but the courier did not know this, he was not warned, I had to wait until he contacted the institution and resolved this issue....

I don't know what I expected. The first time I ordered - they mixed up the roll and put another in the set, I ordered for the new year - they all fell apart as one. the staff themselves say about it and do not hide it.

After reading reviews from a century ago, you understand that nothing has changed here. There is no taste. The rice is terrible. And a lot of it. You can't even taste the fish. Text:
Last weekend I celebrated my birthday at Sushi Icons. It's a great place, from the proactive operator in the call center, of course, to the delicious sushi, the attentiveness and hospitality of the staff, and the nice compliment on my birthday.

Thank you for a pleasant evening at your establishment! We will definitely visit you again! :)

The best sushi delivery. And the sushi itself is at a height. In all of Lviv, there are only 2 places with the best sushi and this is one of them. I can't rate the atmosphere, because they created the atmosphere themselves)

Very mediocre... I agree with the previous reviews, the rolls are quite small, the fillings are really small, the roll with tartar (it was a gift for the first order) is strange and not tasty. However, it should be noted that the prices are not high, compared to similar institutions. In a word, definitely not to my taste. But the site and the application are made cool.

I have never been so disappointed with a home delivery order as I was today. I decided to try sushi from this restaurant because I saw a lot of good reviews.

The amount of filling in the sushi was insufficient. Compared to sushi at other restaurants, the sushi was pretty empty.

As for the fish, the expression "not fresh" accurately reflects my impression. The dried fish had a strange taste and smell that indicated that it might be stale or even unfit for consumption.

Finally, the taste of the rice was too sweet. It was a bit strange and not to my liking. I always think of rice as the main ingredient in sushi, and the excessive sweetness of the rice really affected the overall taste of the dish in a negative way.

Under these circumstances, perhaps the best recommendation would be to avoid this restaurant, at least for home delivery, and look for other establishments where the quality and taste of the sushi will meet your expectations

I will be happy to share my impressions of the delicious rolls. Their menu was impressive with the variety and quality of the ingredients. Text: ordered twice from them through the head. quality can be seen in the photo. the first order for 1-2 photos, the fish was simply enlightened. gave a second chance, waited almost 2.5!! hours for it to arrive like in 3-5 photos, without chopsticks, ordered for two, and only one portion of ginger arrived. it's just horrible, haven't tried worse delivery yet

I ordered it because it is relatively quick to prepare and it is close to home. Unfortunately, the dishes are not at all similar to the photos they have on the website. Ordered a set of rolls, forgot to add one roll. It looks terrible and tastes so-so. Lots of rice, little fish. Well, at least, after complaining about the forgotten roll, they brought it + one as a gift and they looked better than the previous ones. To be honest, I am shocked that after so many years of popularity of sushi in Lviv, that someone manages to mess up like this. And miso soup is something with something, just a bowl of seaweed with a drop of liquid. Salad, not soup))) We talked to the manager of the establishment, who turned out to be very adequate. I hope she manages to build a better team of chefs for this establishment.

But judging by the "disappointing" reviews here and the restaurant's "we're very concerned" responses in recent months, it doesn't look like the Sushi Master chain is in a hurry to improve.

You can't step into the same river twice - these words are definitely not about "Sushi Master".

I was disappointed with the service for the second time in a week: again I did not receive my sushi on time, although I ordered delivery yesterday (today!!). As a result, I received the order that was supposed to be received at 7:00 p.m. almost at 9:30 p.m. Not only was it delivered almost 3 hours late, they also didn't bring the roll they gave me as compensation for the previous undelivered order. Text: Very, VERY tasty! WARNING! Portions are quite large! I weigh 115 kg, and I really like to eat - I took a complex lunch and overeat. The prices are very nice. Borscht with sour cream, stew, potatoes with meat in a pot, salad, cocktail (total cost in the check). Payment in cash or transfer to a card. The territory is beautiful and well-kept, the hall, tables and surroundings are clean. It's cool even in the heat. On the second floor, there is a spacious terrace - very cute and romantic. There are also separate "offices" for small companies. It is possible to take food with you. The waiter Iryna is simply a miracle! I will definitely stay with them again next time. I RECOMMEND!

A normal place near the highway, there is a small parking lot.
The cafe is simple, but you can stop for a snack.
Prices are average.
Delicious, melt-in-your-mouth pork with delicate mushrooms - I recommend it!

Text: I really liked everything, there was a lot of cheese in the pan, the potatoes were like home, the chicken in honey-mustard sauce was very soft and tasty, and the grilled vegetables were cooked just like the gods! The staff is polite and tidy! We will definitely stop by again! Sooner victory, Glory to Ukraine!
Probably the best place to have lunch in King Cross Leopolis. Great variety of dishes. All delicious.
Original Text: Probably the best place to have lunch in King Cross Leopolis. Great variety of dishes. All delicious.

Text: A good cafe where you can eat quickly and deliciously. Ready-made dishes to your taste and choice are put on your plate, dishes have one price per 100 gr. balance. The staff is polite and friendly.

The cafe is located in King's Cross on the second floor. Everything is ready, it remains only to heat it up. All dishes cost UAH 27 per 100 grams. In general, it is not bad, there is a large selection of both meat and vegetable dishes. The pumpkin was peppered, everything else was quite tasty.

The dishes are not very tasty. Everything was oversalted. A photo of potatoes, that is, salt, and then I add potatoes!

I witnessed how the waiter or the cook poured the dishes into those large containers, which were on the counter and at the foot of the table, where the salad was spilled, and then also the potatoes. I made a remark that all the food was lying on the tables, and the waiter picked it all up with his hand and threw it to the rest of the food! That is, in front of my eyes, he picked up the food that fell on the dirty table at his feet and threw it into the container from where customers collect their meals! It's just horrible. If they allow themselves to do this in front of a client, then it means that it is the norm for them, and in the kitchen, probably even more trash is made!
I do not recommend trying anything there!
A large selection of dishes, delicious cuisine, fast service. Interesting design in the style of minimalism.

Great team and nice atmosphere.
Highly recommend this place.  We will come back.

Text:
Your establishment was recommended to us by friends, we came in a very good mood, we were warmly welcomed, they recommended to go to the second hall, because it is darker. We chose a table by the window with access to the courtyard, made an order, had a pleasant conversation with the waiter, and were impressed by the interior. It was quite cold in the hall, the air conditioner was working for heating, but probably not strong enough. We were brought drinks, no complaints, because we were informed about the composition, so ok, we chose ourselves, maybe just not for us (warm cocktail with sea buckthorn).
We ordered two salads, one with spicy and sweet chicken, the other Caesar with chicken, and were indignant because they turned out to be not tasty. That in one, that in the other, the chicken was stewed and very not tasty. In the first, the sauce was just the chicken in the sauce, in the second, everything was covered with sauce too much, which completely spoiled the taste. We left the salads, informed the waiter about it, he said that he would pass it on to the kitchen and come to us. We waited a very long time for an answer and did not wait, asked for the bill, during the payment the waiter told us that the chef said that everyone has their own tastes. On the unpleasant side, there was also the fact that next to our table there was a door where the guests of the establishment and the staff could go out for a smoke break, we could have warned, because it was already cold. The bartender, who was wearing a hood all the time and after a smoke break, started preparing drinks without washing his hands. They were not satisfied as much as possible, there is no desire to come again.
A photo of the left salads and the bill.

The interior is great, the atmosphere is good.
that's where the advantages of the institution ended
the cocktail menu is surprisingly poor
nothing extra will be done for you
the taste of cocktails is very mediocre

regarding the food - I ordered a set of p√¢t√©s and it was very tasteless. The combination of flavors is disgusting. only the bread was tasty

I will not eat here again and I do not advise you)

(drink too)

The menu is interesting, even after the concept has been changed and there are no longer the same products in different formats.

Very beautiful panoramic windows, you can go out to a small balcony.

I came to the store today to buy an advent calendar as a gift. I waited for the seller for 22 minutes, no one appeared.
This is not the first case of poor service, so I decided to leave a review. Although I really want to support Ukrainian business :(
The product is not bad, but the policy of working with customers is strange... Data disappears from the computer along with accumulated points.
It says that they work until 10:00 p.m., I came at 8:42 p.m. and kissed the door üò°

Since they do not want to publish bad reviews on the site, I will repeat them here.

I bought a shampoo and a hair mask with coconut oil, it smells weird and the jar for the mask is very uncomfortable, half of the mask went down the drain with the water. Apart from this, I did not see any effect from the description of the product. The shampoo is no different from mass market shampoos, like a mask. I do not recommend.

Also, how can the products be natural, if the color of some products is neon, then what kind of natural ingredient is neon pink in color?

I bought a gel for washing with hyaluronic acid Hyaluronic acid face wash 0.3% Mr. SCRUBBER. Oh, I got an allergy from this moisturizing gel! I do not recommend to anyone. The skin is red, dry, burns to the touch. Now you need to treat your face with this miracle gel.

We had an amazing experience there with wonderful food, atmosphere, and service.
We had
Tapas with beef tartar - great appetizer
Salad with roast beef - great flavor, the size was a bit small, so you might not get full
Beef tenderloin steak - steak was made well but missed seasoning even a bit more salt would make a difference. The cheese on top was okay, it would be better without it.
We had local beers with our meal and overall had a wonderful experience.
I have 4/5 following the steak experience.

You have created a monster from a beauty that now looks like a mortuary, such a shame, so sad.

Text: A cool place if you want traditional Ukrainian cuisine. There is a lot on the menu - dumplings, borscht, abalone and even chebureks. Everything is quite tasty. Prices are average.

Ordered delivery. Sour borscht was brought. I called, they say that everything is ok, that yesterday was normal. And it already has bubbles and foam. And it tastes spoiled. I am attaching a photo. Therefore, if you do not want to eat yesterday's sour borscht, I do not recommend it

Extremely tasty Ukrainian cuisine. Although, Asian abalone with chicken is extraordinary. Good, calm atmosphere and coziness. The staff deserve special attention - they are attentive, friendly and not intrusive. The waiter Ihor is the decoration of this establishment.

I was lured by the inscription "Chebureks". Chebureks are tasty, have a lot of greens and are not greasy at all. Dumplings with potatoes are also very tasty, with real porcini mushrooms. The atmosphere is great thanks to the favorite Ukrainian modern indie music and friendly staff.
A very cool place with delicious pizza and a nice atmosphere. I would really like to have pizza available in all Salalat establishmentsüçï

Text: This is my first time at this location.  It was during the week, so getting a table was not hard. Drinks were good. The menu is actually a tablet for you to look at the drinks and food option. Text: Saw a bunch of tiktoks for Mama Sushi and decided to visit and try it for myself. Went on a Sunday at 1pm, restaurant was pretty empty.  But soon thereafter, more guests arrived. Now the food. We were a group of 4.  We ordered 4 drinks, 1 each, 3 appetizers for the table, 4 house sushi rolls for the table, and 1 entree for a total of $320, which included gratuity.  The sushi rolls were creative, but at the same time, I felt like we ordered the same thing because they all had a very similar taste.  The Yakisoba noodles were delish. We asked them to spicy it up, not the spice we are use to but still very good.  It was great visiting, but I am not sure if I will be returning as I have a few other places where I can really enjoy the food, have more than 1 drink, and not break my pocket.

The sushi rolls were creative, but at the same time, I felt like we ordered the same thing because they all had a very similar taste.  The Yakisoba noodles were delish. We asked them to spicy it up, not the spice we are use to but still very good.  It was great visiting, but I am not sure if I will be returning as I have a few other places where I can really enjoy the food, have more than 1 drink, and not break my pocket.

Text:
Title: A Sushi Haven with a Twist - Mama Sushi Delivers!

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Yesterday evening, I enjoyed dining at Mama Sushi at 74 Dyckman Street in upper Manhattan. This delightful eatery boasts three unique dining spaces to cater to your ambiance preference ‚Äì a cozy indoor area, a curbside space, and an innovative designated fenced area across the street. Since the weather was on my side, I settled comfortably in the latter, an arrangement showcasing Mama Sushi's creativity in urban space.

As the DJ effortlessly spun a selection of Latin tunes, my senses were entertained and enticed by their kitchen's exotic aroma. The well-chosen music and excellent audio quality added an extra layer of enjoyment to my dining experience, merging seamlessly with the restaurant's lively vibe.

Having had my fill of raw sushi in the past, I sought a different culinary adventure. The courteous and accommodating host pointed me towards their house sushi roll called 237 Dyckman - a delectable blend of Shrimp Tempura, Sweet Plantain, Avocado, and Cream Cheese, all coated in a sublime Eel Sauce and deep-fried to perfection. The sushi roll came with the usual sushi accompaniments and was generously portioned, adding value to the dining experience.

Although the wait was slightly longer than usual, it was understandable, given the bustling weekend crowd and the delightful weather. While the preparation and presentation were impressive, I still preferred the raw sushi variety.

The staff at Mama Sushi deserves a special mention. Despite the language barrier, some team members were not fluent in English, so they provided impeccable service. This place reflects the surrounding neighborhood, with Spanish as a common language.

One glance at their extensive menu shows that this restaurant is not just about sushi. Their vast offerings ensure I'll be back to embark on a new gastronomic journey. And the cherry on top? The roll dish and my soda cost were reasonable, promising quality food without breaking the bank.

Overall, my experience at Mama Sushi was overwhelmingly positive. It's an enchanting blend of delicious, inventive food, refreshing music, a unique ambiance, and welcoming staff. A gem in Manhattan that I'd highly recommend to locals and tourists alike.

Looking forward to my next visit, Mama Sushi! üç£

This delightful eatery boasts three unique dining spaces to cater to your ambiance preference ‚Äì a cozy indoor area, a curbside space, and an innovative designated fenced area across the street. Text:
Mama Sushi on Dyckman is the spot if you want to eat place delicious and creative sushi rolls. We tried the lobster and steak roll, eel avocado roll, and the mama sushi roll, and all of them were tasty. For appetizers, we had the dusted coconut shrimp, and it was simply delectable. The shrimp was perfectly cooked and coated with a light layer of coconut, which gave it a pleasant sweetness. It was served with a tangy dipping sauce that complemented the dish nicely.

To finish off our meal, we had the coconut flan, and it was the perfect way to end the meal. The flan was smooth and creamy, with a subtle coconut flavor that was not overpowering.
Our server checked in on us throughout and was immediately available when we needed something. I would definitely recommend Mama Sushi on Dyckman to anyone who loves sushi and wants to try some unique and delicious rolls.
Original Text:
Mama Sushi on Dyckman is the spot if you want to eat place delicious and creative sushi rolls. We tried the lobster and steak roll, eel avocado roll, and the mama sushi roll, and all of them were tasty. For appetizers, we had the dusted coconut shrimp, and it was simply delectable. The shrimp was perfectly cooked and coated with a light layer of coconut, which gave it a pleasant sweetness. It was served with a tangy dipping sauce that complemented the dish nicely.

To finish off our meal, we had the coconut flan, and it was the perfect way to end the meal. The flan was smooth and creamy, with a subtle coconut flavor that was not overpowering.
Our server checked in on us throughout and was immediately available when we needed something. I would definitely recommend Mama Sushi on Dyckman to anyone who loves sushi and wants to try some unique and delicious rolls.

At least in my experience, I won't judge overall.

Text: Happy hour not honored. Be prepared to be scammed. Calamari, mama sushi roll and house drink all advertised as $12. When the menu came around they charged $20 for each. I asked the waitress and she said I ordered off the ‚Äúregular menu‚Äù when I only ordered it how it was advertised based on the name from the happy hour menu. Will never come back here. The waitress only changed the drink because she realized she charged one with the happy hour price and the other regular price (the food she could get away with since there was no comparison I could make since it was my first time here). Left the calamari and mamasushi roll regular price despite the fact they gave us the happy hour menu and it was still well within the time of ‚Äúhappy hour‚Äù. Overall don‚Äôt come here unless you‚Äôre willing to pay full price.

Text:
The service is what ruins this place entirely.
Black/African American customers beware. The lack of attention/ service for us here is appalling. I sat down at the bar  at the same  time as a Hispanic couple, I even gave up the seat I walked to so they could sit together. They were half complete with their beers before my order for a drink was even taken.
Everytime I needed something I had to flag down the bartender though I was sitting as the corner of the bar very visible. She continued to top off drinks, service with a smile  and take orders from everyone but me.
I was kind and had no obvious reason outside of my skin color not to help me. My drink sat empty for over 15 minutes while I sat silently and watched her serve others, joke with the other 2 bartenders and when her friends came in she was overjoyed and taking videos of them and immediately made them drinks before they went to their table.
She looked at me multiple times with an empty glass and half full plate and never once asked how I was doing.
If you do not visibly look like them or most definitely if you do not speak Spanish at this establishment you will not be treated equally. Save your time and money

Bae had the salmon Bento box and he kept saying how delicious everything was. Def of you haven't check Mama out with the quickness!

Text:
$104.00 for a Johnny Walker Blue Label double before tips.  The included a mandatory 18% service fee, which is not discussed and is not part of the tips. It is a very misleading, almost dishonest practice.

Text:
The institution is not bad. But for us the disadvantages were‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ ordered borscht with some kind of baked bread - delicious, but the potatoes in the borscht were clearly undercooked
‚Ä¢ were in January - it was cold in the hall, you could put pillows on the wooden chairs
‚Ä¢ cooking time - from 20 to 30 minutes (

But from the pluses‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ banosh with sour cream and crackers is super, I recommend it
‚Ä¢ dumplings with torn meat are super tasty
Check for 1 and 2 dishes and 2 compotes for two 700 UAH

I am not sure that I will come here again because of the disadvantages that I described above

Unfortunately, they spent money on advertising and PR in the media and saved on the main thing - the quality of dishes and service.
Ordered olivier and bograch.
The presentation is good, but the taste :(
Olivier had undercooked potatoes. Bograch is thickened with flour or something else for an unknown purpose. Perhaps this is some Galician recipe that has not been found anywhere ‚ôÇÔ∏è ü§∑.
The dishes were served for a very long time, the service by the waiter could also be better.

Had the worst ribs ever that were highly recommended by staff. Over dry and nearly impossible to separate. When the waiter asked how food was and I told her about the ribs, she said ‚Äúoh well, hope you like them better next time‚Äù.

Additionally, the restaurant that has ‚Äúbeer‚Äù in its title had only one kind of draft beer and no beer platters. Some other menu items were also missing.

The waitress removed my fork with the appetizer and when the main course was served, I had to wait for at least 5 minutes to get another one (after I had to get up and ask for it)

Additionally, they charged me extra on an pos-terminal entry error and it took another 10 minutes for them to try to figure out how to refund my card before they finally decided to just give me back some cash.

Text: A sad experience in a restaurant where the staff is not correctly trained, and the cooks not aware of the basics of the Mediterranean cuisine. The Tiramisu was a pure industrial cake usually found in discount supermarkets in the lost parts of Europe. The pasta were seasoned with bad quality (and probably spoiled) salmon with too much salt, and the so called "Greek salad", beside a picturesque plate, had a very poor taste and almost no dressing. This place could only be a Mirage for people who don't know anything about Italian authentic cuisine, even the one served in New York city.
Original Text: A sad experience in a restaurant where the staff is not correctly trained, and the cooks not aware of the basics of the Mediterranean cuisine. The Tiramisu was a pure industrial cake usually found in discount supermarkets in the lost parts of Europe. The pasta were seasoned with bad quality (and probably spoiled) salmon with too much salt, and the so called "Greek salad", beside a picturesque plate, had a very poor taste and almost no dressing. This place could only be a Mirage for people who don't know anything about Italian authentic cuisine, even the one served in New York city.

My favorite institution until yesterday (unfortunately
I don't like to write bad reviews, but this time I have to
It started with pre-ordering two positions by phone (they answered me as if I was not a customer and was asking for free food, the guy was showing how busy they were, and there was an incredible knocking because it was impossible to hear him the first time) but I missed it because everyone we humans all have our quirks
We have come. The waitress was friendly, no questions asked
Then they brought us a hot roll and carbonara, the roll was not fresh, not good and falling apart. Carbonara was not salty. It was extremely unpleasant. I am not scandalous, I asked to pay. They brought me a check, I leave the funds
The waiter takes them away
I'm waiting for the rest, it's not there, I get dressed, I stand waiting for me, there's no reaction, I approach the waiter to ask when the rest will be. She answers: the institution's administrator left or left on his own business, and only he has the right to calculate. I'm still waiting... it's not there. I decide to deposit without change (I exchange money with a person who was nearby) and leave the institution without any positive emotions. I understand, we are all people, we all have things to do, but when you go about your business from the workplace, you will ensure work without yourself.
The kitchen has become worse.

Text:
Excellent Service, Excellent Food, Excellent Quality.

INTERIOR: Very warm and welcoming and a waiter/ waitress is always standing by waiting to serve at the immediate time and live band does play making the place comfortable, fun, and enjoyable.
SERVICE: I was greatly satisfied with service, as waiters and waitresses are always on the ball working hard to make sure your visit is good and service runs smoothly.
FOOD: I'm also very satisfied, it's not only
pizza but many selections on the menu such as burger, sushi, soup, and more even steak which I had before and the steak was cooked very well to the point I was beyond satisfied. As I did had NYSP pizza, the box maybe small/ medium size but the pizza is really good and very filling.
QUALITY: In conclusion, I have absolutely no complaints at all, as I've been very satisfied with the quality of food and service. I would definitely recommend this place to friends. I will be more than happy to return again.

Text: Saw a bunch of tiktoks for Mama Sushi and decided to visit and try it for myself. Went on a Sunday at 1pm, restaurant was pretty empty.  But soon thereafter, more guests arrived. Now the food. We were a group of 4.  We ordered 4 drinks, 1 each, 3 appetizers for the table, 4 house sushi rolls for the table, and 1 entree for a total of $320, which included gratuity.  The sushi rolls were creative, but at the same time, I felt like we ordered the same thing because they all had a very similar taste.  The Yakisoba noodles were delish. We asked them to spicy it up, not the spice we are use to but still very good.  It was great visiting, but I am not sure if I will be returning as I have a few other places where I can really enjoy the food, have more than 1 drink, and not break my pocket.

It was great visiting, but I am not sure if I will be returning as I have a few other places where I can really enjoy the food, have more than 1 drink, and not break my pocket.

Text:
Title: A Sushi Haven with a Twist - Mama Sushi Delivers!

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Yesterday evening, I enjoyed dining at Mama Sushi at 74 Dyckman Street in upper Manhattan. This delightful eatery boasts three unique dining spaces to cater to your ambiance preference ‚Äì a cozy indoor area, a curbside space, and an innovative designated fenced area across the street. Since the weather was on my side, I settled comfortably in the latter, an arrangement showcasing Mama Sushi's creativity in urban space.

As the DJ effortlessly spun a selection of Latin tunes, my senses were entertained and enticed by their kitchen's exotic aroma. The well-chosen music and excellent audio quality added an extra layer of enjoyment to my dining experience, merging seamlessly with the restaurant's lively vibe.

Having had my fill of raw sushi in the past, I sought a different culinary adventure. The courteous and accommodating host pointed me towards their house sushi roll called 237 Dyckman - a delectable blend of Shrimp Tempura, Sweet Plantain, Avocado, and Cream Cheese, all coated in a sublime Eel Sauce and deep-fried to perfection. The sushi roll came with the usual sushi accompaniments and was generously portioned, adding value to the dining experience.

Although the wait was slightly longer than usual, it was understandable, given the bustling weekend crowd and the delightful weather. While the preparation and presentation were impressive, I still preferred the raw sushi variety.

The staff at Mama Sushi deserves a special mention. Despite the language barrier, some team members were not fluent in English, so they provided impeccable service. This place reflects the surrounding neighborhood, with Spanish as a common language.

One glance at their extensive menu shows that this restaurant is not just about sushi. Their vast offerings ensure I'll be back to embark on a new gastronomic journey. And the cherry on top? The roll dish and my soda cost were reasonable, promising quality food without breaking the bank.

Overall, my experience at Mama Sushi was overwhelmingly positive. It's an enchanting blend of delicious, inventive food, refreshing music, a unique ambiance, and welcoming staff. A gem in Manhattan that I'd highly recommend to locals and tourists alike.

Looking forward to my next visit, Mama Sushi! üç£

Text:
Mama Sushi on Dyckman is the spot if you want to eat place delicious and creative sushi rolls. We tried the lobster and steak roll, eel avocado roll, and the mama sushi roll, and all of them were tasty. For appetizers, we had the dusted coconut shrimp, and it was simply delectable. The shrimp was perfectly cooked and coated with a light layer of coconut, which gave it a pleasant sweetness. It was served with a tangy dipping sauce that complemented the dish nicely.

To finish off our meal, we had the coconut flan, and it was the perfect way to end the meal. The flan was smooth and creamy, with a subtle coconut flavor that was not overpowering.
Our server checked in on us throughout and was immediately available when we needed something. I would definitely recommend Mama Sushi on Dyckman to anyone who loves sushi and wants to try some unique and delicious rolls.
Original Text:
Mama Sushi on Dyckman is the spot if you want to eat place delicious and creative sushi rolls. We tried the lobster and steak roll, eel avocado roll, and the mama sushi roll, and all of them were tasty. For appetizers, we had the dusted coconut shrimp, and it was simply delectable. The shrimp was perfectly cooked and coated with a light layer of coconut, which gave it a pleasant sweetness. It was served with a tangy dipping sauce that complemented the dish nicely.

To finish off our meal, we had the coconut flan, and it was the perfect way to end the meal. The flan was smooth and creamy, with a subtle coconut flavor that was not overpowering.
Our server checked in on us throughout and was immediately available when we needed something. I would definitely recommend Mama Sushi on Dyckman to anyone who loves sushi and wants to try some unique and delicious rolls.

Text: Happy hour not honored. Be prepared to be scammed. Calamari, mama sushi roll and house drink all advertised as $12. When the menu came around they charged $20 for each. I asked the waitress and she said I ordered off the ‚Äúregular menu‚Äù when I only ordered it how it was advertised based on the name from the happy hour menu. Will never come back here. The waitress only changed the drink because she realized she charged one with the happy hour price and the other regular price (the food she could get away with since there was no comparison I could make since it was my first time here). Left the calamari and mamasushi roll regular price despite the fact they gave us the happy hour menu and it was still well within the time of ‚Äúhappy hour‚Äù. Overall don‚Äôt come here unless you‚Äôre willing to pay full price.

Text:
The service is what ruins this place entirely.
Black/African American customers beware. The lack of attention/ service for us here is appalling. I sat down at the bar  at the same  time as a Hispanic couple, I even gave up the seat I walked to so they could sit together. They were half complete with their beers before my order for a drink was even taken.
Everytime I needed something I had to flag down the bartender though I was sitting as the corner of the bar very visible. She continued to top off drinks, service with a smile  and take orders from everyone but me.
I was kind and had no obvious reason outside of my skin color not to help me. My drink sat empty for over 15 minutes while I sat silently and watched her serve others, joke with the other 2 bartenders and when her friends came in she was overjoyed and taking videos of them and immediately made them drinks before they went to their table.
She looked at me multiple times with an empty glass and half full plate and never once asked how I was doing.
If you do not visibly look like them or most definitely if you do not speak Spanish at this establishment you will not be treated equally. Save your time and money

So we ordered several of the gigantic ones :) Hard to imagine how they cope when there are more people at the restaurant.

Text: True to say, don‚Äôt know why everyone complain about service. We‚Äôve been here dozens of times and never had this issue. Of course this is not a hipster fancy restaurant, but food is good, portions big, prices very pleasant. Average bill for two is around 400-500UAH (with drinks!) So if you want something fancy stylish - continue searching, but if you want tasty Ukrainian food for everyday, then this is your place for sure.

Text:
The institution is not bad. But for us the disadvantages were‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ ordered borscht with some kind of baked bread - delicious, but the potatoes in the borscht were clearly undercooked
‚Ä¢ were in January - it was cold in the hall, you could put pillows on the wooden chairs
‚Ä¢ cooking time - from 20 to 30 minutes (

But from the pluses‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ banosh with sour cream and crackers is super, I recommend it
‚Ä¢ dumplings with torn meat are super tasty
Check for 1 and 2 dishes and 2 compotes for two 700 UAH

I am not sure that I will come here again because of the disadvantages that I described above

Unfortunately, they spent money on advertising and PR in the media and saved on the main thing - the quality of dishes and service.
Ordered olivier and bograch.
The presentation is good, but the taste :(
Olivier had undercooked potatoes. Bograch is thickened with flour or something else for an unknown purpose. Perhaps this is some Galician recipe that has not been found anywhere ‚ôÇÔ∏è ü§∑.
The dishes were served for a very long time, the service by the waiter could also be better.

Had the worst ribs ever that were highly recommended by staff. Over dry and nearly impossible to separate. When the waiter asked how food was and I told her about the ribs, she said ‚Äúoh well, hope you like them better next time‚Äù.

Additionally, the restaurant that has ‚Äúbeer‚Äù in its title had only one kind of draft beer and no beer platters. Some other menu items were also missing.

The waitress removed my fork with the appetizer and when the main course was served, I had to wait for at least 5 minutes to get another one (after I had to get up and ask for it)

Additionally, they charged me extra on an pos-terminal entry error and it took another 10 minutes for them to try to figure out how to refund my card before they finally decided to just give me back some cash.

Text: A sad experience in a restaurant where the staff is not correctly trained, and the cooks not aware of the basics of the Mediterranean cuisine. The Tiramisu was a pure industrial cake usually found in discount supermarkets in the lost parts of Europe. The pasta were seasoned with bad quality (and probably spoiled) salmon with too much salt, and the so called "Greek salad", beside a picturesque plate, had a very poor taste and almost no dressing. This place could only be a Mirage for people who don't know anything about Italian authentic cuisine, even the one served in New York city.
Original Text: A sad experience in a restaurant where the staff is not correctly trained, and the cooks not aware of the basics of the Mediterranean cuisine. The Tiramisu was a pure industrial cake usually found in discount supermarkets in the lost parts of Europe. The pasta were seasoned with bad quality (and probably spoiled) salmon with too much salt, and the so called "Greek salad", beside a picturesque plate, had a very poor taste and almost no dressing. This place could only be a Mirage for people who don't know anything about Italian authentic cuisine, even the one served in New York city.

My favorite institution until yesterday (unfortunately
I don't like to write bad reviews, but this time I have to
It started with pre-ordering two positions by phone (they answered me as if I was not a customer and was asking for free food, the guy was showing how busy they were, and there was an incredible knocking because it was impossible to hear him the first time) but I missed it because everyone we humans all have our quirks
We have come. The waitress was friendly, no questions asked
Then they brought us a hot roll and carbonara, the roll was not fresh, not good and falling apart. Carbonara was not salty. It was extremely unpleasant. I am not scandalous, I asked to pay. They brought me a check, I leave the funds
The waiter takes them away
I'm waiting for the rest, it's not there, I get dressed, I stand waiting for me, there's no reaction, I approach the waiter to ask when the rest will be. She answers: the institution's administrator left or left on his own business, and only he has the right to calculate. I'm still waiting... it's not there. I decide to deposit without change (I exchange money with a person who was nearby) and leave the institution without any positive emotions. I understand, we are all people, we all have things to do, but when you go about your business from the workplace, you will ensure work without yourself.
The kitchen has become worse.

Text:
Excellent Service, Excellent Food, Excellent Quality.

INTERIOR: Very warm and welcoming and a waiter/ waitress is always standing by waiting to serve at the immediate time and live band does play making the place comfortable, fun, and enjoyable.
SERVICE: I was greatly satisfied with service, as waiters and waitresses are always on the ball working hard to make sure your visit is good and service runs smoothly.
FOOD: I'm also very satisfied, it's not only
pizza but many selections on the menu such as burger, sushi, soup, and more even steak which I had before and the steak was cooked very well to the point I was beyond satisfied. As I did had NYSP pizza, the box maybe small/ medium size but the pizza is really good and very filling.
QUALITY: In conclusion, I have absolutely no complaints at all, as I've been very satisfied with the quality of food and service. I would definitely recommend this place to friends. I will be more than happy to return again.

Text:
Adequate ordering via the Internet is already a big advantage, because in some establishments you still have to write to Viber and throw money inexplicably.

That's where the good stuff ends.
The rolls come with ordinary square tubs with no wasabi and dubious ginger.
They took the most expensive set, where they probably should have put the best rolls, only one turned out to be tasty - maki with shrimp. The roll covered with processed cheese is simply disgusting, the rest of the order is not good, it is also cut crookedly üíî

Just now I found out that sushi appeared in my apartment. I immediately decided to try it and regretted that I didn't know about them before. Everything is very tasty. The products are fresh, the portions are large. We didn't specify how many people to prepare the dishes for, we were given separate dishes, ginger and wasabi for each portion of rolls, which was especially pleasing. Definitely recommend
I ordered sushi - the rolls are fresh and tasty. Good quality packaging. I liked.

Sushi is big and very tasty, fast and cheap, not crowded. It was difficult to find a place, I went around the yards and then saw a pink sign on a pole, I attached a photo of the entrance, maybe it will help someone.
Very tasty sushi, I would especially recommend baked ones

The food was good. My issue was with the waitress. She was impatient and after I received my meal I didn‚Äôt see her again until I asked me for the bill. I had to get up to get a napkin. Then waited and waited for a top up of my drink but didn‚Äôt see her or any else for that matter. Then when I had pushed away my empty plates, she showed up asking if that will be cash or credit card. Then before I had a chance to open my wallet she was back ready to collect the cash. It‚Äôs too bad for the owner, I would have had a few more drinks and possibly desert but now I will not go back at all.
Original Text: The food was good. My issue was with the waitress. She was impatient and after I received my meal I didn‚Äôt see her again until I asked me for the bill. I had to get up to get a napkin. Then waited and waited for a top up of my drink but didn‚Äôt see her or any else for that matter. Then when I had pushed away my empty plates, she showed up asking if that will be cash or credit card. Then before I had a chance to open my wallet she was back ready to collect the cash. It‚Äôs too bad for the owner, I would have had a few more drinks and possibly desert but now I will not go back at all.

Text: Not great, not terrible. We were a larger group, and I think we were the only ones at the restaurant on a Wednesday evening. The waitress was a lovely young lady, but she forgot to bring cutlery and mixed up one of the dishes in the order ‚Äì it happens. Banosh was nice, holubtsi ‚Äì so-so. Had to wait a long time for the food, and they didn't have enough regular size glasses for beers for us (we were about 15 people max). So we ordered several of the gigantic ones :) Hard to imagine how they cope when there are more people at the restaurant.
Original Text: Not great, not terrible. We were a larger group, and I think we were the only ones at the restaurant on a Wednesday evening. So we ordered several of the gigantic ones :) Hard to imagine how they cope when there are more people at the restaurant.

Text: True to say, don‚Äôt know why everyone complain about service. We‚Äôve been here dozens of times and never had this issue. Of course this is not a hipster fancy restaurant, but food is good, portions big, prices very pleasant. Average bill for two is around 400-500UAH (with drinks!) So if you want something fancy stylish - continue searching, but if you want tasty Ukrainian food for everyday, then this is your place for sure.

So if you want something fancy stylish - continue searching, but if you want tasty Ukrainian food for everyday, then this is your place for sure.

Text:
The institution is not bad. But for us the disadvantages were‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ ordered borscht with some kind of baked bread - delicious, but the potatoes in the borscht were clearly undercooked
‚Ä¢ were in January - it was cold in the hall, you could put pillows on the wooden chairs
‚Ä¢ cooking time - from 20 to 30 minutes (

But from the pluses‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ banosh with sour cream and crackers is super, I recommend it
‚Ä¢ dumplings with torn meat are super tasty
Check for 1 and 2 dishes and 2 compotes for two 700 UAH

I am not sure that I will come here again because of the disadvantages that I described above

Unfortunately, they spent money on advertising and PR in the media and saved on the main thing - the quality of dishes and service.
Ordered olivier and bograch.
The presentation is good, but the taste :(
Olivier had undercooked potatoes. Bograch is thickened with flour or something else for an unknown purpose. Perhaps this is some Galician recipe that has not been found anywhere ‚ôÇÔ∏è ü§∑.
The dishes were served for a very long time, the service by the waiter could also be better.

Had the worst ribs ever that were highly recommended by staff. Over dry and nearly impossible to separate. When the waiter asked how food was and I told her about the ribs, she said ‚Äúoh well, hope you like them better next time‚Äù.

Additionally, the restaurant that has ‚Äúbeer‚Äù in its title had only one kind of draft beer and no beer platters. Some other menu items were also missing.

The waitress removed my fork with the appetizer and when the main course was served, I had to wait for at least 5 minutes to get another one (after I had to get up and ask for it)

Additionally, they charged me extra on an pos-terminal entry error and it took another 10 minutes for them to try to figure out how to refund my card before they finally decided to just give me back some cash.

Text:
It looks nice on photos and when walking past but it really doesn‚Äôt meet expectations.
The appetizer had sauces with bread and nothing fit together.

For the main corse we had ribs and salmon. The salmon was small and had nothing with it so we ordered potatoes. That was not made clear by the menu nor the waiter. It tasted good according to my gf but part of it was overcooked and hard.
The ribs were also a bit too hard where I had expected soft and tender meat. It was mediocre only.

We changed our minds and decided to get dessert elsewhere.

But from the pluses‚òùüèº:
‚Ä¢ banosh with sour cream and crackers is super, I recommend it
‚Ä¢ dumplings with torn meat are super tasty
Check for 1 and 2 dishes and 2 compotes for two 700 UAH

I am not sure that I will come here again because of the disadvantages that I described above

Unfortunately, they spent money on advertising and PR in the media and saved on the main thing - the quality of dishes and service.
Ordered olivier and bograch.
The presentation is good, but the taste :(
Olivier had undercooked potatoes. Bograch is thickened with flour or something else for an unknown purpose. Perhaps this is some Galician recipe that has not been found anywhere ‚ôÇÔ∏è ü§∑.
The dishes were served for a very long time, the service by the waiter could also be better.

Had the worst ribs ever that were highly recommended by staff. Over dry and nearly impossible to separate. When the waiter asked how food was and I told her about the ribs, she said ‚Äúoh well, hope you like them better next time‚Äù.

Additionally, the restaurant that has ‚Äúbeer‚Äù in its title had only one kind of draft beer and no beer platters. Some other menu items were also missing.

The waitress removed my fork with the appetizer and when the main course was served, I had to wait for at least 5 minutes to get another one (after I had to get up and ask for it)

Additionally, they charged me extra on an pos-terminal entry error and it took another 10 minutes for them to try to figure out how to refund my card before they finally decided to just give me back some cash.

Text:
It looks nice on photos and when walking past but it really doesn‚Äôt meet expectations.
The appetizer had sauces with bread and nothing fit together.

For the main corse we had ribs and salmon. The salmon was small and had nothing with it so we ordered potatoes. That was not made clear by the menu nor the waiter. It tasted good according to my gf but part of it was overcooked and hard.
The ribs were also a bit too hard where I had expected soft and tender meat. It was mediocre only.

We changed our minds and decided to get dessert elsewhere.

Text:
Adequate ordering via the Internet is already a big advantage, because in some establishments you still have to write to Viber and throw money inexplicably.

That's where the good stuff ends.
The rolls come with ordinary square tubs with no wasabi and dubious ginger.
They took the most expensive set, where they probably should have put the best rolls, only one turned out to be tasty - maki with shrimp. The roll covered with processed cheese is simply disgusting, the rest of the order is not good, it is also cut crookedly üíî

Just now I found out that sushi appeared in my apartment. I immediately decided to try it and regretted that I didn't know about them before. Everything is very tasty. The products are fresh, the portions are large. We didn't specify how many people to prepare the dishes for, we were given separate dishes, ginger and wasabi for each portion of rolls, which was especially pleasing. Definitely recommend
I ordered sushi - the rolls are fresh and tasty. Good quality packaging. I liked.

Sushi is big and very tasty, fast and cheap, not crowded. It was difficult to find a place, I went around the yards and then saw a pink sign on a pole, I attached a photo of the entrance, maybe it will help someone.
Very tasty sushi, I would especially recommend baked ones

The food was good. My issue was with the waitress. She was impatient and after I received my meal I didn‚Äôt see her again until I asked me for the bill. I had to get up to get a napkin. Then waited and waited for a top up of my drink but didn‚Äôt see her or any else for that matter. Then when I had pushed away my empty plates, she showed up asking if that will be cash or credit card. Then before I had a chance to open my wallet she was back ready to collect the cash. It‚Äôs too bad for the owner, I would have had a few more drinks and possibly desert but now I will not go back at all.

Then when I had pushed away my empty plates, she showed up asking if that will be cash or credit card. Then before I had a chance to open my wallet she was back ready to collect the cash. It‚Äôs too bad for the owner, I would have had a few more drinks and possibly desert but now I will not go back at all.

Text: Not great, not terrible. We were a larger group, and I think we were the only ones at the restaurant on a Wednesday evening. The waitress was a lovely young lady, but she forgot to bring cutlery and mixed up one of the dishes in the order ‚Äì it happens. Banosh was nice, holubtsi ‚Äì so-so. Had to wait a long time for the food, and they didn't have enough regular size glasses for beers for us (we were about 15 people max). So we ordered several of the gigantic ones :) Hard to imagine how they cope when there are more people at the restaurant.

Text: True to say, don‚Äôt know why everyone complain about service. We‚Äôve been here dozens of times and never had this issue. So if you want something fancy stylish - continue searching, but if you want tasty Ukrainian food for everyday, then this is your place for sure.

The food was good. My issue was with the waitress. She was impatient and after I received my meal I didn‚Äôt see her again until I asked me for the bill. I had to get up to get a napkin. Then waited and waited for a top up of my drink but didn‚Äôt see her or any else for that matter. Then when I had pushed away my empty plates, she showed up asking if that will be cash or credit card. Then before I had a chance to open my wallet she was back ready to collect the cash. It‚Äôs too bad for the owner, I would have had a few more drinks and possibly desert but now I will not go back at all.

Text: Not great, not terrible. We were a larger group, and I think we were the only ones at the restaurant on a Wednesday evening. The waitress was a lovely young lady, but she forgot to bring cutlery and mixed up one of the dishes in the order ‚Äì it happens. Banosh was nice, holubtsi ‚Äì so-so. Had to wait a long time for the food, and they didn't have enough regular size glasses for beers for us (we were about 15 people max). So we ordered several of the gigantic ones :) Hard to imagine how they cope when there are more people at the restaurant.
