I believe that this is not at all competent in relation to customers and their superiors who had hope for these employees. The desire to visit this particular place disappeared. Please influence the future of your institution

Text: We came to this establishment around 6 pm, ordering 4 borscht, khachapuri, banosh, and mashed potatoes. Now the highlight of the program, KHACHAPURI, photo attached, in Adjara, turned out to be a cheese bun with fried eggs. The place is disgusting, the table next door has not been cleaned for 2 hours at the time of writing this review, the service is disgusting, you have to clean the dirty dishes yourself at the next table, the prices are high, prohibitively high, it would be better to eat shawarma. The place is terrible, I don't recommend it to anyone

Text:
My boyfriend and I keep returning to this restaurant every time we‚Äôre in the city. We‚Äôve tried at least half a menu at this point and every breakfast, bowl, dessert and drink that we ordered were fresh, flavourful and delicious. This place is a truly fusion restaurant.
Speaking about their coffee and alternative drinks, you can learn how to make your own drink under the supervision of their bartender Sukhrob. I appreciate the bartenders even more after the masterclasses.
Highly recommend to check it yourself.

Text:
This is GEM!
I've been visiting this place multiple times and I always come back! This means a lot.
Wanna say that this place serves very unique and delicious meals, some of them so special, that you won't find anything like that around or even in the whole country!
I think I tried 90% of their menu so far. Great thing about their menu, that you can modify dishes the way you like(if it's physically possible of course).
Must mention their professional and artistic barista Sukhrob, who can teach you how to make your own perfect coffee or cocktail.
WA Lviv using is high quality products and their menu has mostly healthy options.
You will get glass of water without asking for it, which is not common for Ukraine, so you can understand the level of service here.
There is a charging station, sockets for your laptop or just to charge your phone around each table.
Interior design is something that you would notice the moment you enter. Every once in a while they are hosting special exhibition of modern art, which is so cool!
You might also enjoy their awesome playlist.
Urban vibe and tiny details made my experience there unforgettable.
Prices are decent, servers are friendly and knowledgeable.
If you are willing to try new and delicious, you MUST visit this place - I'm highly recommending.

A wooden chairs and green‚Äôish decorations support the wood theme of the bar. The drinks itself were delicious ! On Sunday evening there were not much people , and we felt too intimate with a waitress and security ( I wish they were a bit further away!). Still a strong 5.

Text: The venue is not client-oriented at all. The waiters showed totally unprofessional. It took them 40 minutes to prepare and to offer business lunch and another 15 minutes to print the bill for lunch. The waiter showed ignorance in front of me as a client, and he said that there is no staff that is why the order was that much late, while near the cash counter there were plenty of colleagues simply chatting between them and not paying heed at all to surrounding customers. Moreover, why do you offer business lunch menu, if more than half of the dishes presented in the menus are not available? Is it just cheat customers? I do not recommend to visit this venue especially when it comes to business lunch.

Text: RACIST AND SCAMMING BAR STAFF DO NOT GO HERE!!! Unless you support right wing fascist establishments that like to scam tourists. The waitress purposely banged into both me & my brother then accused us of spilling the drink she was carrying & tried to charge us(this doesn‚Äôt happen in decent bars, most will just absorb the cost). When we refused, security then forced us to leave. They would not let me have my coat from the cloakroom unless we paid for this scam. At least two maybe three people were in on it, the others I think were innocently supporting their story. When we told someone outside they came out & tried to hush us so nobody would know. We also threatened to go to the police. Eventually we decided to just pay their scam so we could leave & get on with our night. They are sad & desperate people, I feel sorry for them. We were having such a nice evening in Lviv, Ukraine & their country folk should be ashamed of people like this. Tourists, especially non-whites should stay away from here. Just reading other reviews, they run extortion scams here. STAY AWAY!

Text:
Not a real "all you can eat" place. Don't be fooled into coming here thinking you can eat as much as you want as there are stupid rules that no all you can eat place in Western Europe, Asia or North America  or any reputable all you can eat establishment has.

FYI I went to the Kyiv main restaurant and the silly requirements such as eating all of the rice and lettuce was not required. I ate 1 kg of meat on the grill without requesting the lettuce or other condiments. Only meat and rice.

Service is great though.

I wouldn't call this an authentic Korean BBQ place. Probably the best in terms of Asian cuisine places in Ukraine, but then again any ethnic food from Asia or any other continent other than Europe are quite lacking here, but still pretty low in terms of flavor and authenticity.

Okay for the craving.

Text:
The restaurant above the candy store has always been an elegant place, with attentive service and excellent cuisine, but my last visit was on the 4th.
The babaganush is great, but it only comes in two tiny pies, so order more right away.
But the schnitzel, which this place is famous for, this time was completely disappointing, all the breading "fell off" from the meat, unfortunately I did not appreciate the potato salad, as it was dressed with a sauce with a noticeable amount of mustard and it interrupted the taste of the potatoes themselves.
Of course, sweets from the Candy Store are always good.
The waiters are very well trained, they know what to advise, but probably due to the fact that now during the renovation the Sugar Shop and the Restaurant are united in one room and there are more visitors from above, they are very busy, they have to wait a long time for a table, you have to wave your hand to attract attention, that's why this is also the nuance of the service, which I hope is temporary.
Of course, the atmosphere here is cozy, especially at the table near the window.
I really liked the institution. A gorgeous setting, very tasty food, unsurpassed desserts and exquisite service. I definitely recommend it both for breakfast and for a cup of coffee with a treat

I didn't like the brew, it's for an amateur. She was skeptical until the food was brought. Everything was very tasty. Quiet and peaceful, despite the location in the very center of the city. Attentive waiters - they didn't have time to sit down at the table, as they already brought a high chair. The institution left a pleasant impression.

Very tasty cuisine, one of the best I've tasted. Great snacks - hummus, baba ganoush, avocado mousse. Incredible Carpathian rabbit, delicious salads. The chef transforms familiar dishes into original ones that you won't try anywhere else. Cocktails and service are also top notch.
The restaurant has one drawback - it is not in Kyiv)

Good evening. For the first time in my life, I am leaving a negative review ((I did not expect that in the very center of the city in a famous candy store, my friends and I, after ordering with such enthusiasm and anticipation, would receive stale cakes. Stale is a very light word... Out of the four cakes ordered: mine "Black Forest", Ani "Blueberry Cheesecake, Oli" Meringue Kyiv, only Olena "Strawberry Cake" was fresh, as the waiter said, although the cream generally spread and did not hold its shape. Two of our cakes were weathered, visually stale, mine was chocolate the fudge has become sugary from time immemorial, the cakes are grayish-brown in color, dry, the cream has started to layer... The cheesecake had too much gelatin, the color, appearance is stale, tasteless. The meringue cake tastes more or less normal

Place Name: Kefal π, Restoran Rodom Z Odesy
Text: Friendly Stuff. Atmosphere good. They have very tasty Fish. I choose a different dish every visit. All the dishes I've tasted so far are delicious. Today we talked with the director about wine and he offered me a wonderful Odessa wine.(free treat). Thank you . The decoration is very beautiful. There are many places in Lviv to take photos and post them on Instagram.  There are few places with such delicious food.  I hope you will be successful and that there will be a peaceful environment in the city center where we can eat good food and drink wine for many years to come.

Place Name: Kefal π, Restoran Rodom Z Odesy
Text:
I'll start with the positives! Very nice and pleasant place! Atmosphere, music, surroundings. A very nice girl, the waiter, offered me some prosecco and promised to feed me in 20 minutes. We were a family, the children were hungry. There were few guests, but the wait for the order was 40 minutes!!! The broth and fish soup are delicious and beautiful! The red mullet was ok, but the fried bulls were hopelessly spoiled. They were absolutely tasteless, and besides, they were deep-fried and not in a frying pan, as is customary in our country. Therefore, they had a lot of excess fat, and the breading was soggy; they were not crunchy at all.
For people who had not been to their native Mariupol for 2 years, the sea fish and the atmosphere promised bliss, but it did not happen

Place Name: Kefal π, Restoran Rodom Z Odesy
Text:
I came from another city to visit this institution, and I am incredibly impressed by how comfortable it was there
Very tasty food, prosecco, extremely pleasant staff
I want to express my great gratitude to the girl Viola who served us, she told a very touching story of the establishment and recommended dishes
Given the opportunity, I would definitely like to return to this institution, and in the future visit it in its native land in Odessa ü•π

Text:
Ordered delivery to Churasco
We waited the declared 40 minutes, everything is ok!
A simply terrible order of sauce for the entire package arrived, it was terrible.
But I was very pleased with the institution's work, they responded quickly to the complaint. Everything was fixed and delivered. The dishes are very tasty, we are satisfied. I recommend this establishment!!!
I have ordered khachapuri several times, it is very tasty. But there is a question about delivery. The yolk was scattered all over the package and it happened more than once (

A little while ago, I ordered delivery from Bar Mushlya, expected a delivery time of about 40 minutes, but they called me and said that due to weather conditions, the delivery time would be an hour. It didn't suit me very much, but I agreed. In the end, I waited for that delivery for 1 hour and 30 minutes! A boy arrived on a scooter. He apologized that the problem was in weather conditions. But the scooter does not stand in traffic! And the time to get to the shell showed me 40 minutes, not 90!
This refers to the time since the food was prepared, not the total time since the order was placed. Since I live outside the city, I actually sat in the car for almost an hour waiting for that delivery, and by the time we got home, everything was already cold!
I think that the delivery is poorly organized or the guys can't handle it, because they couldn't drive 90 minutes from Mushli to Pivdenny!

We visited you in Churasco. We have not tasted tastier Georgian cuisine in Lviv. The service is at a height, the kitchen is even higher.
And since it is too lazy to cook at home and go to the store in a cold December, only ZARA BUDU helps.
We ordered khinkali and khachapuri, and specialty meat.
We felt incredible bliss, very tender meat, namely wings in some very tasty marinade, also cooked on the grill.
The caesar with very tasty chicken was also drooling.
The courier delivered everything warm and intact.
Awesome cuisine, delivery, restaurant and staff.
Now you must visit Lviv
We ordered sushi on Fonvizvna, in addition to terrible rolls and stale products, we received a bone in the fish and poisoning

I often use delivery, but usually order pizza. This time I decided to try sushi
Everything was delivered on time.
In general, the sushi is normal, but the rice is a little hard and some sushi have irrelevantly cut fish. There is enough filling, the taste is not bad.

First time ordering here.
set "Autumn Sketch" and added an Ebi Tempura roll (with fried shrimp). I really liked it. Delicious! Delivery is very fast. Compared to other very famous ones, the Royal ones have soared very high. All in all, our taste buds had a blast. We didn't have time to take a photo. We will definitely order again! Thank you! Keep it up!
For 270 UAH you can add more filling. I won't buy from you again

Text:
Made a pre-order on December 29 with delivery on December 31 at 6:00 p.m. Order confirmed. At 6:05 p.m. on December 31, he called to check if everything was OK with the order. They said that yes, everything is ready, now they are giving it to the courier. 7:05 p.m. called again, but they didn't pick up. The website indicated that the order was fulfilled, but it was never delivered. This is a New Year's surprise. It's good, even though I didn't pay money in advance.

I ordered not for the first time and had no comments on the quality of the dishes, but I will not order again because of the terrible service. If they made a mistake, they could at least apologize, instead of lying that you will still bring the order

I ordered 1 kg of pork ribs and 300 g of veal rack.
The marinade is disgusting, everything is salty, the meat is not fresh (the veal is not fresh)
I happened to have a scale at home, which I used to weigh the pork ribs, and they turned out to be 160 grams less... I called to find out what the problem was, they said that the ribs had given off juice and the juice was also taken into account, but you know, it wasn‚Äôt included with the onions and the box 1 kg, so you better imagine the glass of juice that should have been in the box... doesn't make sense? Fraudsters and sellers of low-quality meat. I don't recommend it.
Horror!!! Order for UAH 500. Half was thrown away. Delivery in 2 hours... DRIVEWAY ONLY! Everything is burnt... Zero service. I am posting a photo, see for yourself.

We ordered pesto pizza, 4 pieces of thin tomato for the whole pizza. Half a pizza without a tomato... But the pizza is delicious. Employees are not friendly, it is often necessary to repeat the order 3 times to finally issue it...

The last two visits to this bakery can be described in one word: "disappointment".
1) The order placed in advance (in 2.5 hours) and paid for is not ready, I have to wait another 45 minutes, I have not heard any apologies.
2) On 11/23/23 I bought a brownie that tasted like a not-so-fresh oatmeal cookie. I'm sorry, but a brownie shouldn't be rock hard.
It is possible that other people worked in this establishment for the first two months. If so, return them back.

I had an amazing lunch at Red Pepper üå∂Ô∏è. It is always a stop for me when visiting Lviv. Their Tom Yum is actually spicy! I also enjoyed their signature drink ‚ÄúRed Pepper‚Äù which was delicious and smooth. Today I also got a Tuna California roll and added their ‚Äúred pepper‚Äù sauce for heat which made an amazing combo. Lastly, I ordered an imperial dragon which had eel with shrimp tempura inside. A huge roll with lots of flavor and fresh ingredients. I cannot wait to return! The service provided by Orest was attentive and immaculate. He made sure to check everything was exactly how I ordered. He made sure to provide his recommendations when I asked which is the best roll. Make sure to make it a stop here whether you are staying or visiting. This is one the culinary gems of the city.

Text:
The rolls are huge and very tasty)
The ratio of fish to rice is perfect. After the change of owners, Miso became really better ‚ò∫Ô∏è

What can I say about this institution: the institution itself is small, the friendliness of the staff is not felt. Instead of cool background music, the radio plays with advertisements. Waiting time ¬±1 hour. The waiter is also a cook, that is, to order or ask for something, you have to wait. When serving, the dish that was served is not called. There are more cucumbers and avocados in the rolls than fish (the main flavor is rice and cucumbers).

We took miso soup with shrimp, Philadelphia rolls with eel and Philadelphia with salmon. Also Hiyashi wakame salad. + OOlong milk tea.
Everything is very tasty. Portions are large. Roles really ran. The soup is thick and rich.
Service time - 15-20 minutes. Everything is friendly and atmospheric. Top music.

Well, listen, I watched the anime, and I wanted to try the noodles like in the anime Naruto, but I really didn't watch it, because I don't like it. But nevertheless, it was tasty, but not like in the anime, so I give it 3 stars

Congratulations! Every Friday, I buy bread, samsa and pie with rumbambar and strawberries in this establishment. I was always very satisfied! I bought a tunnel yesterday for 450 hryvnias. and received, unfortunately, a very large "cracker", a larger one similar to Italian cookies with hard nuts. It should be more moist and saturated with butter, not breadcrumbs. The photo shows that a moist particle remained, but very much inside, when everything around is dry.

The new "Krymska perepichka" on Sadova is a good place in a new building and in an area where, unlike the center, there are not many good coffee shops, almost everything is sold out in the evening. Nice children's area, clean, tasty, good toilet, good design. But it's still somehow not so comfortable, probably because the place is still "fresh".

Great coffee, pastries, service.
A little secret location, which is why there are not many visitors.

Imagine how delicious it would be if I went from Ryasne-2 to buy pastries in "Krymska Perepichka". The best samsa in Lviv, delicious kubete, Swiss bread, Spartak cake. This time I came out without eclairs, so as not to overdo it, but these are the most delicious eclairs in my life.
Atmosphere of peace and friendliness. I think music will be added over time :)
A nice and friendly institution. Very tasty coffee and croissants. There is a ramp.
Awesome ! Have nice time on Fresh !

Text:
A delicious place in our area :)
I am not coming here for the first time, because there are not many establishments on Pasichnaya, so this is a great comfort for the whole district.
A simple cafe, without tricks, where, however, everything is very tasty.
I liked that the waitress advised what was better to try and could tell which of the dishes had the best taste.
We tried the roast beef with green butter, it was really cool! But the minus is 3 croutons to it, for such a portion you need to add at least one more.
Pumpkin soup was also delicious, thick, with nuts and bacon.
We also tried entrecote, tender meat and excellent mashed potatoes "just like mom's".
In a word, simple and very tasty, thank you very much!

The cuisine is delicious, the service is good, but the establishment needs to be updated (the premises need restoration), the menu would like to be updated, something new added, for so long the same thing on the menu.
A cozy and comfortable place for rest and meals. The incredibly refined and very tasty cuisine is pleasantly impressive :-)

Lviv Coffee Manufacture was my favorite cafe in Lviv, and I went to a few. The coffee itself was very smooth-tasting. I bought a coffee mug and some whole coffee beans to take home with me. They will grind them for you in the store of you want, but I can do it when I get home :)
Original Text: Lviv Coffee Manufacture was my favorite cafe in Lviv, and I went to a few. The coffee itself was very smooth-tasting. I bought a coffee mug and some whole coffee beans to take home with me. They will grind them for you in the store of you want, but I can do it when I get home :)

Text:

I suppose, management of the cafe should pay more attention to their staff's trainings. We visited the place 24.08.2021 about 17-00..18-00.

It is one of those places I wouldn't visit again.

Text: This cafe makes the best pastries and cakes using the highest quality of ingredients...you can tell this from just one bite! I say this as a picky person. Hands down, Honey cafe is a must visit on any occasion. Their eclairs are simply exquisite with the filling done right, and a balance of flavours. The chocolate and berry eclairs are particularly decadent...not too sweet, just perfect. Another thing that I admire about this place are the staff. The service is warm, friendly, and just simply professional. I particularly want to thank Alexander from TSUM Honey cafe. He is the loveliest person who is super friendly, an expert in taste, and always greets me with a smile when I drop by for my coffee. I also recommend French Kiss cake that comes in the small or large version! I picked up an order of the French Kiss cake for my mum's birthday today and I'm absolutely thrilled with the professional service, craftsmanship, and the taste palette of this cake. If you want a light and fruity treat, French Kiss is literally "chef's kiss"! Thank you to the top manager for organising a swift delivery and for catering to my needsüôè üôå I really appreciate your help. I look forward to ordering more cakes in the future ‚ù§Ô∏è

definitely my favorite place. good location, pleasant atmosphere, neat and friendly staff; Georgian-style restaurant, cozy; clean and shiny dishes, and most importantly - incredibly tasty dishes, I really liked the Megrelian khachapuri and four cheeses. I recommendüëçüèª
If you dream of the atmosphere of Tbilisi and feel the hospitality of Georgia, this is the place for you. I recommend rack of lamb, ribs in orange sauce and khinkali. And tarragon!!!

Biggest disappointment in a long time. I don't feel like going to a restaurant at all, it's a cafe, going once is already too much... Food +-, although I liked only one of the 3 dishes - khachapuri, the meat is very mediocre. But the atmosphere is the bottom. The tables are placed in such a way that it is simply impossible to reach some, and on others people sit almost on top of each other and disturb the staff. When this was pointed out to the manager of the "restaurant", she did not even admit that there were problems and did not try to improve the impression of the establishment and only offered to move now. This despite the fact that they booked a table more than a week in advance, and gave the worst option even though there were others free! The music is playing very loudly and three times we asked to make it quieter, because we couldn't hear each other, it only helped for a while, because it was the manager who came and made it louder. Absolute disappointment, the establishment is not worthy of being called a restaurant

Visited your place for the first time today. The dinner turned out to be extremely tasty and atmospheric. Waiter Olenka is the soul of the establishment! Thank you very much for the excellent service, extremely tasty food and the original birthday greeting. You always want to come back for MORE!

Text:
My wife and I had some tacos and nachos here. Pretty good, overpriced. Way too many toppings on the tacos for the tiny tortillas, so they are guaranteed to break and make a mess. The nachos had a cheesy seasoning, basically Doritos.

There aren't many Mexican places in Ukraine which aren't terrible, so it's worth a visit.

They have vegetarian tacos.

Text: Amazing place, the bartender was extremely helpful-helping us choosing what we would like to drink even though we had no clue about Mexican alcohol. The staff was really friendly and down to earth and I felt like they put a lot of effort into preparing those beautiful drinks. Even though it was our first time visiting this place, we felt like regular visitors. Couldn't recommend it more. In addition the man serving us spoke really good polish which made the whole experience easier. Definitely a must if you're visiting Lviv and feel like having some delicious cocktails.

In addition the man serving us spoke really good polish which made the whole experience easier. Definitely a must if you're visiting Lviv and feel like having some delicious cocktails.

Text: It is a bright Latin American bar where there is always an atmosphere of celebration, Cuban dancing and Mexican fervor, and tequila is flowing like a river. Facility's main drinks are tequila and mescal. The cocktail list accentuates classic cocktails with Latin American twists. Also on the list are micheladas and chupitos shots. To accompany the drinks, tacos, nachos and ceviche are served here. All in all a rather atmospheric place with great music, delicious cocktails and cheerful and positive bartenders! However, sometimes visitors can be a bit heavy on alcohol and get noisy.
Original Text: It is a bright Latin American bar where there is always an atmosphere of celebration, Cuban dancing and Mexican fervor, and tequila is flowing like a river. Facility's main drinks are tequila and mescal. The cocktail list accentuates classic cocktails with Latin American twists. Also on the list are micheladas and chupitos shots. To accompany the drinks, tacos, nachos and ceviche are served here. All in all a rather atmospheric place with great music, delicious cocktails and cheerful and positive bartenders! However, sometimes visitors can be a bit heavy on alcohol and get noisy.

Text:
This place charmed me with its atmosphere and the beauty of the street. Small and cozy tables are located on the terrace in summer. I came for breakfast early in the morning, the cafe was just opening. I was the first customer, but in just a couple of minutes 30% of the tables were filled with people. I ordered breakfast and coffee, it was prepared very quickly. I was pleasantly surprised.
I wasn‚Äôt in the middle of the cafe, but I think it‚Äôs also very cozy there, just like outside. It was cool early in the morning, the waiter took care of me and brought me a blanket.
The waiter did not bother me, as is sometimes customary. I liked it all very much. I‚Äôm really looking forward to the summer so I can go to this cafe again and enjoy the moment. Thank you.

As a result, we enjoyed our breakfast in other lovely restaurant.

I visited this establishment with a friend yesterday. The idea is interesting, there is no concept. It is not clear where the entrance to the institution is, it seems like they wanted to make a riddle, but it turned out as if you ask us and we will tell you where the entrance is. The taste is not tasty at all, sweet, dry. This is an ordinary sponge cake and not Belgian chocolate at all. I am a confectioner and I can definitely tell where the chocolate is. This impression is as if ordinary chocolate "crown" or roshen was melted. I am generally silent about the chocolate in the middle, as if it were a simple chocolate filling from the supermarket. The choice of drinks is minimal. They offered to add chocolate in the middle of the bar, but they did not say that there would be an additional fee for this.
Drinks are generally a problem. Three types of juice, two types of teas, and those from a bag, not brewed. I can't say about coffee and alcoholic drinks because I don't drink them. The staff is not competent in what they offer, they cannot explain what the tea they offer tastes like. Not satisfied and do not recommend.

And moreover - this is not my favorite type of pizza - i prefer ultrathin dough , still this was amazing. And fabulous atmosphere with climatic classic music adds +10 to taste.

Text: It's hard to tell how you end up finding this place. First, your local friends tell you with great passion about liquors and spirits your imagination can't even imagine and you toung starts feeling an almost primal, visceral urge to try it. Then, you came to Lviv, in a quest of taste and drinking pleasures, and visit this place. It's not big, nor small - cozy, almost like home is how you feel it. Then you see a menu and order what seems to be an ordinary set here. You have no expectations, no biases, and start trying... And then, images of the wildest foods, tastes from a childhood, moms dishes and medicine you were guilty to like. But now, you allow yourself to enjoy it to it's litteral bottom. You order more, and just drink how it supposed to be - for a taste, experience, feeling, not just a raw booze. So, I don't know should i say more. If you are a person who is tired of drinking boring things - come here - you will have a drinking experience this country should be proud to have!
Original Text: It's hard to tell how you end up finding this place. First, your local friends tell you with great passion about liquors and spirits your imagination can't even imagine and you toung starts feeling an almost primal, visceral urge to try it. Then, you came to Lviv, in a quest of taste and drinking pleasures, and visit this place. It's not big, nor small - cozy, almost like home is how you feel it. Then you see a menu and order what seems to be an ordinary set here. You have no expectations, no biases, and start trying... And then, images of the wildest foods, tastes from a childhood, moms dishes and medicine you were guilty to like. But now, you allow yourself to enjoy it to it's litteral bottom. You order more, and just drink how it supposed to be - for a taste, experience, feeling, not just a raw booze. So, I don't know should i say more. If you are a person who is tired of drinking boring things - come here - you will have a drinking experience this country should be proud to have!

Text:
This is a great buffet restaurant. Take a plate, help yourself and you pay by weight. There were some really obscure breakfast choices at this place, but plenty of great stuff too. It was bright, airy, and stuffed with chandeliers.
There is coffee and fresh juice.
I had an apple and cinnamon stuffed crepe and a German cheesecake for breakfast, yes, I know it isn't conventional, but it was lovely.
I spent ¬£1.50 including a latte.

Text:
A quick service restaurant. The place offers salads, meals, soups, desserts instantly available - most priced at weight at a single price. The place is new but interior, at the second floor especially, is decorated with pieces of wooden junk (furniture, window fragments) that look literally like been picked up at a garbage dump.
I do NOT recommend this place for tourists. There are plenty of much better spots worth spending time at.

There are better bars in Lviv, don‚Äôt bother with the Secret Bar

In general, you can visit once, but it is quite difficult to recommend ;(

I often visit Asian cuisine establishments, and this establishment is definitely worthy of your attention!
No pretentious signs or arrogance, reasonable prices with very tasty cuisine and snacks, broken cucumbers, separate varnish and adequate and cool service. Definitely like it, thank you)

I am familiar with this establishment, even from their previous location, so you compare anyway.
It's always delicious, especially their rich soups, which don't spare a sea of ‚Äã‚Äãcilantro.
However, the previous establishment was perceived more for relaxation, here it is purely a dining room atmosphere: come, eat, leave, and this is rather a minus.
A great option for a quick, tasty snack in the center.

today I tasted the pho bo, which was praised to me, but the expectations were not fulfilled at all :(
very cloudy broth and meat as if a cat had cried.
kimchi, pickled cucumbers, asparagus beans - it was delicious, I liked the service, the girls are nice and friendly, but unfortunately the pho was the most disappointing.
also, I was surprised by the already darkened basil in the plate, it doesn‚Äôt look very good)

I managed to visit this restaurant "Good People".
It's about comfort and coziness. You can retire to a corner, on a soft sofa, or sit by the window or the children's room.
I liked the cocktails and the cuisine.
The children's menu is especially delicious.
I liked the saxophonist, who created an unreal pleasant atmosphere in the institution.
Keep it up ‚ù§Ô∏è

The menu needs to be worked on. The selection is small, if you are a vegetarian, then there is nothing for you to eat there. The potatoes were so fatty that you could survive the oil on them, and we waited for them for an hour, despite the fact that the hall was empty except for a small banquet, the meat in the salad was dry, the salad was not tasty at all. Some items were not on the menu. We expected better, but the institution did not live up to expectations.

After visiting this restaurant, I was impressed by everything from the excellent service to the excellent culinary skills. First of all, I want to note the friendly staff, who create a very cozy and hospitable atmosphere. The delicious dishes served in this establishment leave an unforgettable impression. The ingredients used are fresh and exquisite, and the chefs have shown extraordinary creativity in creating each dish. I recommend trying their main dishes, especially their desserts are impressive. The atmosphere and flavors you will find here will surely create unforgettable moments for you. I look forward to coming back here again.

A cozy place, not yet well-known, which I consider a significant advantage. A wide selection of cocktails and incredibly tasty dishes (for which you should wait a little)

Text:
My wife and I have already visited La Famiglia twice and I want to say that so far we have only had positive emotions.
Pizza Caesarini (4/5), today we tasted "Korida" (4/5).
It's delicious, everything is fine, the choice is nice, but they still haven't chosen the one that's definitely delicious.
There are several salads in the assortment,
Salad with veal tongue and beetroot mousse (4/5) - delicious.
Today we decided to order "Salad with camembert cheese and honey mustard dressing" (5/5), extremely tasty.
We also tried today "Tempura chicken (cheese sauce)" (3/5), it seemed greasy, at least it would not be superfluous to soak it a little with a napkin before serving (
Drinks - whatever they cost - everything was delicious. The assortment is very large and it seems to me that everything is delicious.
I recommend the establishment, I will recommend it to friends, but so far without anything extraordinary)

Thank you, it was very tasty. If there was an opportunity to put six stars, then immediately put it. My friends and I had a nice and tasty meal in an atmospheric restaurant with really delicious Italian cuisine, pastas and salads are especially well put together. The alcohol menu is truly impressive. The understanding waiters will help you choose a meal to go with your drinks. Thank you very much for the wonderful moments at La Familia

It is a pity that the level of service is so low.
I fully understand that it is a weekend, and the number of guests may be higher, so why not put more staff on shift?
We ordered 3 beers, 2 pizzas and 1 portion of antipasti.
In a few minutes they brought beer, after 15 minutes pizza, after another 5 we were served a table, but the antipasti was never brought, although we were counting on it before the pizza.
After some time, the administrator came to clear the table, we clarified how long we would have to wait for the antipasti, what was the answer, whether we had ordered it at all and how long ago.
It was clear that the waitress had simply forgotten to punch in our order completely.
Having spent another good 10 minutes waiting, I had to refuse the meal, because the cut, which is prepared at 100% occupancy of the establishment, takes up to 15 minutes, but no more.

We stopped here for dinner, the choice of this place turned out to be random (we were guided by reviews on google maps), the first obstacle we faced was the location of the restaurant, it is difficult to find it because the location on the map does not correspond to the actual stay. But we are stubborn people, so after looking around we still found him. We recommend that owners install additional billboards or adjust location information. Everything about the interior is very decent: nice, clean, design in modern motifs. The waiter is polite, took the order quickly, navigated the menu, served the dishes on time. I can't say that the menu is big, there aren't many dishes. We chose broth for the first course, and pork steak with potatoes and veal medallions with mushroom sauce for the second course. Everything was tasty, the meat was cooked well, the design of the dish could have looked more restaurant-like, but it did not affect the taste in any way. Prices are standard, as for this type of establishment. In general, we are satisfied, maybe we will come back to try your oysters) A pleasant bonus was a flyer for a 10% discount on the next visit)
Very friendly staff, excellent service, which is a rarity in Polonyna Flower. Delicious borscht, dumplings, cherry dumplings. I want to come back here again‚ù§Ô∏è

How cool that an establishment with such delicious food appeared in Solochyna near Kvitka Polonyna! We have been vacationing here for many years, but food has always been a problem. Delicious food and good service, the menu has various dishes for all tastes! Bograch with a record amount of meat and very tasty pizza. And cold prosecco)))

very nice staff, good atmosphere.
I just have a note regarding the meat. good cooking and presentation. but unfortunately the meat is tasteless. maybe some seasoning or marinade would fix it. unfortunately there is not enough sauce

I will write honestly, the institution has room to grow. But we were in the summer when the institution was just starting its work. The staff is not yet permanent, the menu is being tested.
But I will 100% come back if I'm there again. The atmosphere is very cozy. Owners and managers try to take feedback, what is liked, what is not. Most dishes are very tasty.
We lived in the complex where the institution is located, so we went there many times. Both for breakfast and dinner, in addition, the establishment serves by the pool when it's warm. I don't like oysters (a feature of the establishment), so I didn't taste them, but my friend said they were very fresh and tasty.
My husband knows cheese and was very surprised that such expensive cheeses are put in the pizza, this is the level when quality products are selected, and they do not want to save on everything. I wish you development! Well done to you for sincerely listening to reviews.
Good Ukrainian cuisine, friendly service and Ukrainian music live played at the tables. We visited the restaurant 2021 before the war. I hope it could continue as it was.
Original Text: Good Ukrainian cuisine, friendly service and Ukrainian music live played at the tables. We visited the restaurant 2021 before the war. I hope it could continue as it was.

Original Text: Very friendly service and delicious food. They have a great wine selection with reasonable prices. Everything is cooked to order so some things like steak or veal might take longer so don't be in a hurry. Plan to hang out for awhile. If you want a fun show order a Sambuca!

Text:
Came here with my girl Friday at 19:00. Nice atmosphere. They had a violinist and accordion players come to our table. Prices were about normal for Lviv. Good staff. Outlets at each table for charging phones. The menu is in English as well.

But.  The food took a looong time and they weren't busy. The mackerel tasted wrong. The waiter said that's how it should taste but my girl couldn't eat it so we ordered another plate of potato pancakes. They were pretty good but the first order was cooked different, so obviously the chef isn't paying close attention tonight. My trout tasted good.

I probably won't come back, but overall my experience was ok.

Text: At the entrance is an advertisement with a promotion. When you try to order a promotional offer, it turns out that it has not been available for a long time. At the same time, the staff refuses to erase 1+1=3 and continues to mislead people.

Well, not that the bottom. But it is not at all tasty, the burger was brought with a semi-RAW cutlet, not everyone likes it, even if it is beef. The burger is undersalted, there is almost no taste. Store ketchup is added, which is very noticeable and not tasty. The cutlet in the onion burger is thin (as in the poppy seed cheeseburger). I was expecting a classic burger (with a cutlet 1.5-2 cm thick). In short, tasteless, either lower the price or improve the burgers. After all, burgers are quite fast food, but they should not be tasty. I will not come again.

I visited this institution more than once with my friends. Everything in the kitchen is delicious, the burgers are just amazing... there are no issues with the service either.
I will continue to be a regular guest of this establishment. Well done!

There are 4 people in the establishment who are already eating burgers, and a new order for a burger has to wait 20 minutes, despite the fact that there are 4 people in the kitchen))) a little long, considering the time of frying the patties, well, a maximum of 7 minutes)
I can imagine how long you will have to wait for a burger if the restaurant is full)

Unfriendly staff. They promised to fulfill the order of two burgers in 15-20 minutes, as a result, they expected more than 50 minutes. After the first visit, the impressions were better, after a month the quality of service deteriorated sharply
A cozy place to have lunch. The atmosphere was transmitted down to the smallest details. The rolls are extremely fresh and tasty. Enjoyed to the last bite.
Very pleasant atmosphere, tasty, high quality. And most importantly, good guys and girls work here üëçüëçüëç

Everything is very tasty.
The employees are friendly, will listen to your preferences and will choose a place for you.
My God, the most delicious sushi I have eaten in the last 2 years! There is no such thing in Europe

They were passing through Lviv and stopped on land. I want to say that we ate sushi a lot. And in Europe as well. But we have never met tastier than here. My husband and I have already memorized the address and will definitely stop by again. Very friendly staff, this is something that is sometimes lacking in other cities. Text: Very, VERY tasty! WARNING! Portions are quite large! I weigh 115 kg, and I really like to eat - I took a complex lunch and overeat. The prices are very nice. Borscht with sour cream, stew, potatoes with meat in a pot, salad, cocktail (total cost in the check). Payment in cash or transfer to a card. The territory is beautiful and well-kept, the hall, tables and surroundings are clean. It's cool even in the heat. On the second floor, there is a spacious terrace - very cute and romantic. There are also separate "offices" for small companies. It is possible to take food with you. The waiter Iryna is simply a miracle! I will definitely stay with them again next time. I RECOMMEND!

Text: I really liked everything, there was a lot of cheese in the pan, the potatoes were like home, the chicken in honey-mustard sauce was very soft and tasty, and the grilled vegetables were cooked just like the gods! The staff is polite and tidy! We will definitely stop by again! Sooner victory, Glory to Ukraine!

Text:
Delicious food, convenient location, pleasant service!!
What else is needed?
The range of dishes will satisfy the tastes and preferences of people of different ages.
Come in, taste it. There will be no disappointments!
A good cafe where you can eat quickly and deliciously. Ready-made dishes to your taste and choice are put on your plate, dishes have one price per 100 gr. balance. The staff is polite and friendly.

The cafe is located in King's Cross on the second floor. Everything is ready, it remains only to heat it up. All dishes cost UAH 27 per 100 grams. In general, it is not bad, there is a large selection of both meat and vegetable dishes. The pumpkin was peppered, everything else was quite tasty.

The dishes are not very tasty. Everything was oversalted. A photo of potatoes, that is, salt, and then I add potatoes!

I witnessed how the waiter or the cook poured the dishes into those large containers, which were on the counter and at the foot of the table, where the salad was spilled, and then also the potatoes. I made a remark that all the food was lying on the tables, and the waiter picked it all up with his hand and threw it to the rest of the food! That is, in front of my eyes, he picked up the food that fell on the dirty table at his feet and threw it into the container from where customers collect their meals! It's just horrible. If they allow themselves to do this in front of a client, then it means that it is the norm for them, and in the kitchen, probably even more trash is made!
I do not recommend trying anything there!

Great team and nice atmosphere.
Highly recommend this place.  We will come back.

Text:
Your establishment was recommended to us by friends, we came in a very good mood, we were warmly welcomed, they recommended to go to the second hall, because it is darker. We chose a table by the window with access to the courtyard, made an order, had a pleasant conversation with the waiter, and were impressed by the interior. It was quite cold in the hall, the air conditioner was working for heating, but probably not strong enough. We were brought drinks, no complaints, because we were informed about the composition, so ok, we chose ourselves, maybe just not for us (warm cocktail with sea buckthorn).
We ordered two salads, one with spicy and sweet chicken, the other Caesar with chicken, and were indignant because they turned out to be not tasty. That in one, that in the other, the chicken was stewed and very not tasty. In the first, the sauce was just the chicken in the sauce, in the second, everything was covered with sauce too much, which completely spoiled the taste. We left the salads, informed the waiter about it, he said that he would pass it on to the kitchen and come to us. We waited a very long time for an answer and did not wait, asked for the bill, during the payment the waiter told us that the chef said that everyone has their own tastes. On the unpleasant side, there was also the fact that next to our table there was a door where the guests of the establishment and the staff could go out for a smoke break, we could have warned, because it was already cold. The bartender, who was wearing a hood all the time and after a smoke break, started preparing drinks without washing his hands. They were not satisfied as much as possible, there is no desire to come again.
A photo of the left salads and the bill.

The interior is great, the atmosphere is good.
that's where the advantages of the institution ended

nothing extra will be done for you
the taste of cocktails is very mediocre

regarding the food - I ordered a set of p√¢t√©s and it was very tasteless. The combination of flavors is disgusting. only the bread was tasty

I will not eat here again and I do not advise you)

(drink too)

We had an amazing experience there with wonderful food, atmosphere, and service.
We had
Tapas with beef tartar - great appetizer
Salad with roast beef - great flavor, the size was a bit small, so you might not get full
Beef tenderloin steak - steak was made well but missed seasoning even a bit more salt would make a difference. The cheese on top was okay, it would be better without it.
We had local beers with our meal and overall had a wonderful experience.
I have 4/5 following the steak experience.

This amazing place has been ruined by an out of touch interior designer with delusions of grandeur, how this person can call himself an interior designer or whatever is confusing...

Vardkes Arzumanyan what was your vision exactly?
Tsukernia Lviv, you had such a good thing why change it?

You have created a monster from a beauty that now looks like a mortuary, such a shame, so sad.

Text: A cool place if you want traditional Ukrainian cuisine. There is a lot on the menu - dumplings, borscht, abalone and even chebureks. Everything is quite tasty. Prices are average.

Ordered delivery. Sour borscht was brought. I called, they say that everything is ok, that yesterday was normal. And it already has bubbles and foam. And it tastes spoiled. I am attaching a photo. Therefore, if you do not want to eat yesterday's sour borscht, I do not recommend it

Extremely tasty Ukrainian cuisine. Although, Asian abalone with chicken is extraordinary. Good, calm atmosphere and coziness. The staff deserve special attention - they are attentive, friendly and not intrusive. The waiter Ihor is the decoration of this establishment.

I don't know what happened, but the institution, which I used to love very much, unexpectedly went bad. We came on Sunday, the hall was not full, but the lady who took the order said that the waiting time for the dishes was 30-35 minutes. It's strange, but okay, we came specifically to see you. We witnessed how people at the next table asked why the waiting time was so long, the lady explained that there is still delivery and the dishes are prepared on the spot. So, 40 minutes have passed, cold mashed potatoes are brought to me. In fact, you say?)) I say that the puree is cold, the lady takes my dish with the words "I only bring food" and disappears. I wait a few minutes and go down to ask what happened to my mashed potatoes. I hear "we are processing")) after another 10 minutes after waiting for dishes for 40 minutes, they bring me the same heated puree. The turkey patties became very dry, or I was lucky twice today.
Dumplings with cherries were brought 55 minutes after ordering, the cherry is as sour as possible.
I understand that there are different situations, but unfortunately, it is not very pleasant.
Do you have cool dishes, a cool selection? will solve the problem with anticipation, because there is not always so much time to sit.
